CVE-2013-0230.title: MiniUPnP CVE-2013-0230 Stack-Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-0230.body: MiniUPnP is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data.                                               An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the device that uses the affected library. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the application.                                 MiniUPnP 1.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-0248.title: Apache Commons FileUpload CVE-2013-0248 Insecure Temporary File Creation Vulnerability
CVE-2013-0248.body: Apache Commons FileUpload is prone to an insecure temporary file-creation vulnerability because it creates temporary files in an insecure manner.                                            An attacker with local access could potentially  exploit this issue to perform symbolic-link attacks, overwriting  arbitrary files in the context of the affected application. Other  attacks may also be possible.                            Apache Commons FileUpload versions 1.0 through 1.2.2 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-0291.title: WordPress NextGEN Gallery Plugin Path Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-0291.body: The NextGEN Gallery plugin for WordPress is prone to a path-disclosure vulnerability.                            An attacker can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.                            NextGEN Gallery versions 1.9.10 and 1.9.11 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-0345.title: Varnish 'access.log' Insecure File Permissions Vulnerability
CVE-2013-0345.body: Varnish is prone to an insecure file-permission vulnerability.                                    A local attacker can exploit this issue by gaining access to a world-readable  log file and extracting sensitive information from it. Such  information could aid in other attacks.

CVE-2013-0504.title: Adobe Flash Player CVE-2013-0504 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-0504.body: Adobe Flash Player is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability.                                                                                                   An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the  context of the application or cause  denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2013-0517.title: IBM Sterling External Authentication Server Local Arbitrary Command Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2013-0517.body: IBM Sterling External Authentication Server is prone to a local arbitrary command-execution vulnerability.                Local attackers can exploit this issue to  execute arbitrary commands with the privileges of the administrator user. This  may facilitate a complete compromise of an affected application.        The following versions are affected:        IBM Sterling External Authentication Server 2.4.1    IBM Sterling External Authentication Server 2.4.0    IBM Sterling External Authentication Server 2.3.01    IBM Sterling External Authentication Server 2.2.0

CVE-2013-0629.title: Adobe ColdFusion CVE-2013-0629 Unauthorized Access Vulnerability
CVE-2013-0629.body: Adobe ColdFusion is prone to an unauthorized-access vulnerability.                                                Attackers can exploit this issue to gain unauthorized access to the restricted directories. This may aid in further attacks.                  Note: This issue affects ColdFusion customers who do not have password protection enabled or do not have a password set.

CVE-2013-0732.title: Nuance PDF Reader 'pdfcore8.dll' File Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-0732.body: Nuance PDF Reader is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it  fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data.                          Attackers may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.                          Nuance PDF Reader 7.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-0736.title: WordPress Mingle Forum Plugin CVE-2013-0736 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2013-0736.body: Mingle Forum plugin for WordPress is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability.                                                                                                                                                            Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions in the context of the affected application. Other attacks are also possible.                                                                                                 Mingle Forum 1.0.34 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-0740.title: Dell OpenManage Server Administrator 'file' Parameter Open Redirection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-0740.body: Dell OpenManage Server Administrator is prone to an open-redirection vulnerability.                            An attacker can leverage this issue by constructing a crafted URI and  enticing a user to follow it. When an unsuspecting victim follows the  link, they may be redirected to an attacker-controlled site; this may  aid in phishing attacks. Other attacks are possible.                   Dell OpenManage Server Administrator 7.2.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-0928.title: EMC AlphaStor Format String and Command Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-0928.body: EMC AlphaStor is prone to a format-string vulnerability and a remote command-injection vulnerability.                                         An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code. Failed  exploit attempts will likely result in a denial-of-service condition.                EMC AlphaStor versions prior 4.0 Build 800 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-0946.title: EMC AlphaStor Library Control Program CVE-2013-0946 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-0946.body: EMC AlphaStor is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary-checks on user-supplied data.                                                                      An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions  or execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected  application.                             Versions prior  to EMC AlphaStor 4.0.Build 116 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1091.title: Novell iPrint Client CVE-2013-1091 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1091.body: Novell iPrint Client is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data.                            An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the  context of the application. Failed exploit attempts likely result in  denial-of-service conditions.                           Versions prior to Novell iPrint Client 5.90 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1112.title: Cisco Carrier Routing System CVE-2013-1112 Unspecified Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1112.body: Cisco Carrier Routing System is prone to an unspecified denial-of-service vulnerability.                     An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a partial drop of legitimate  traffic passing through the device, resulting in a  denial-of-service condition for legitimate users.                    This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCud79136.

CVE-2013-1412.title: DataLife Engine 'catlist' Parameter PHP Code Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1412.body: DataLife Engine is prone to a remote PHP code-injection vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to inject and execute arbitrary PHP code in the context of the affected application. This may facilitate a compromise of the application and the underlying system; other attacks are also possible. DataLife Engine 9.7 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-1464.title: WordPress Audio Player Plugin 'playerID' Parameter Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1464.body: The Audio Player plugin for WordPress is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Audio player versions prior to 2.0.4.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1608.title: Symantec NetBackup Appliance Management Console CVE-2013-1608 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1608.body: Symantec NetBackup Appliance is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability that affects the Management Console web interface. Exploiting this issue allows an authenticated, but unprivileged attacker to access and download privileged files through directory-traversal sequences. Symantec NetBackup Appliance 2.0.x versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1611.title: Symantec Brightmail Gateway Management Console Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-1611.body: Symantec Brightmail Gateway is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Symantec Brightmail Gateway 9.5.x are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1612.title: Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager CVE-2013-1612 Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1612.body: Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. An attacker may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code on the affected server with the privileges of the application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2013-1613.title: Symantec Security Information Manager CVE-2013-1613 SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1613.body: Symantec Security Information Manager is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Versions prior to Symantec Security Information Manager 4.8.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1614.title: Symantec Security Information Manager Cross Site Scripting and HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-1614.body: Symantec Security Information Manager is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability and an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Versions prior to Symantec Security Information Manager 4.8.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1615.title: Symantec Security Information Manager CVE-2013-1615 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1615.body: Symantec Security Information Manager is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks. Versions prior to Symantec Security Information Manager 4.8.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1616.title: Symantec Web Gateway CVE-2013-1616 Remote Command Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1616.body: Symantec Web Gateway is prone to a remote command-injection vulnerability. Successful exploits will result in the execution of arbitrary commands with elevated privileges in the context of the affected appliance. Versions prior to Symantec Web Gateway 5.1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1617.title: Symantec Web Gateway CVE-2013-1617 SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1617.body: Symantec Web Gateway is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Versions prior to Symantec Web Gateway 5.1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1631.title: Verax NMS Multiple Security Bypass and Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-1631.body: Verax NMS is prone to multiple security-bypass and information disclosure vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to bypass certain security restrictions, perform unauthorized actions, and obtain sensitive information; this may aid in launching further attacks. Versions prior to Verax NMS 2.1.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1765.title: WordPress Smart Flv Plugin 'jwplayer.swf' Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-1765.body: The Smart Flv plugin for WordPress is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2013-1839.title: Squid 'strHdrAcptLangGetItem()' Function Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1839.body: Squid is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to trigger denial-of-service conditions due to excessive CPU resource consumption. Squid 3.2.5 and 3.2.7 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-1868.title: VLC Media Player HTML Subtitle Multiple Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-1868.body: VLC Media Player is prone to multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user or to trigger denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to VLC Media Player 2.0.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1938.title: Zimbra 'aspell.php' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1938.body: Zimbra is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2013-1954.title: VLC Media Player ASF File Handling Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1954.body: VLC media player is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently validate user-supplied input. Attackers may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions. VLC Media Player 2.0.5 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2046.title: ownCloud 'lib/bookmarks.php' Script CVE-2013-2046 SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2046.body: ownCloud is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Note: This issue was previously discussed in BID 59875 (ownCloud Multiple Security Vulnerabilities), but has been moved to its own record for better documentation. Versions prior to ownCloud 4.5.11 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2054.title: strongSwan CVE-2013-2054 DNS TXT Record Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2054.body: strongSwan is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application or cause the application to crash, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. strongSwan 1.0 through 4.3.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2087.title: Gallery 'key' Values Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2087.body: Gallery is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Gallery 3.0.6 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-2143.title: Katello CVE-2013-2143 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2143.body: Katello is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because of missing authorization checks. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions and gain escalated privileges. Katello version 1.5.0-14 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2157.title: OpenStack Keystone CVE-2013-2157 Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2157.body: Keystone is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to gain unauthorized access to the affected application and disclose sensitive information.

CVE-2013-2226.title: GLPI Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-2226.body: GLPI is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. GLPI 0.83.7 and 0.83.8 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2227.title: GLPI 'filetype' Parameter Local File Include Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2227.body: GLPI is prone to a local file-include vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input before being used to include files. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to view files or execute arbitrary script code in the context of the web server process. This may aid in further attacks. GLPI 0.83.7 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-2248.title: Apache Struts CVE-2013-2248 Multiple Open Redirection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-2248.body: Apache Struts is prone to multiple open-redirection vulnerabilities because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can leverage these issues by constructing a crafted URI and enticing a user to follow it. When an unsuspecting victim follows the link, they may be redirected to an attacker-controlled site; this may aid in phishing attacks. Other attacks are possible. Apache Struts 2.0.0 prior to 2.3.15.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2259.title: Cryptocat CVE-2013-2259 Multiple Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-2259.body: Cryptocat is prone to multiple arbitrary code-execution vulnerabilities. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Cryptocat 2.0.21 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-2261.title: Cryptocat Chrome Extension 'img/keygen.gif' File Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2261.body: Cryptocat is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. Cryptocat 2.0.21 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-2262.title: Cryptocat 'strophe.js' Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2262.body: Cryptocat is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently validate user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. Cryptocat 2.0.21 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-2269.title: Aruba Networks Multiple Products CVE-2013-2269 Access Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2269.body: Aruba Networks ClearPass and ClearPass Guest are prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue will allow attackers to bypass certain security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to the network; this may aid in further attacks. The following versions are vulnerable: Aruba Networks ClearPass versions 5.x, 6.0.1 and 6.0.2 Aruba Networks ClearPass Guest versions 3.0 through 3.9.7

CVE-2013-2279.title: Multiple CA SiteMinder Products SAML Signature Validation Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2279.body: Multiple CA SiteMinder products are prone to a signature-verification security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass the signature validation mechanism and impersonate another user. This vulnerability affects the following products: CA SiteMinder Federation CA SiteMinder Agent for SharePoint CA SiteMinder for Secure Proxy Server

CVE-2013-2616.title: RubyGems MiniMagic 'mini_magick.rb' Remote Command Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2616.body: mini_magick is prone to a remote command-execution vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary commands in the context of the affected application.

CVE-2013-2627.title: Leed 'id' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2627.body: Leed is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2013-2694.title: WordPress WP Symposium Plugin 'u' Parameter Open Redirection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2694.body: The WP Symposium plugin for WordPress is prone to an open-redirection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can leverage this issue by constructing a crafted URI and enticing a user to follow it. When an unsuspecting victim follows the link, they may be redirected to an attacker-controlled site; this may aid in phishing attacks. Other attacks are possible. WP Symposium 13.04 is vulnerable; other versions may also be vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2701.title: WordPress Social Sharing Toolkit Plugin Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2701.body: The Social Sharing Toolkit plugin for WordPress is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions in the context of the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Social Sharing Toolkit 2.1.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-2712.title: KrisonAV CMS Cross Site Scripting and Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-2712.body: KrisonAV CMS is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability and a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. An attacker may exploit these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, perform unauthorized actions, and disclose or modify sensitive information. Other attacks may also be possible. KrisonAV CMS versions prior to 3.0.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2713.title: KrisonAV CMS Cross Site Scripting and Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-2713.body: KrisonAV CMS is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability and a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. An attacker may exploit these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, perform unauthorized actions, and disclose or modify sensitive information. Other attacks may also be possible. KrisonAV CMS versions prior to 3.0.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2714.title: WordPress podPress Plugin 'playerID' Parameter Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2714.body: The podPress plugin for WordPress is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. podPress 8.8.10.13 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-3060.title: Apache ActiveMQ CVE-2013-3060 Information Disclosure and Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3060.body: ActiveMQ is prone to a security vulnerability that allows an attacker to disclose sensitive information or cause denial of service conditions. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to gain access to sensitive information or cause denial of service conditions. ActiveMQ versions prior to 5.8.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-3070.title: NetGear WNDR4700 CVE-2013-3070 Unspecified Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3070.body: NetGear WNDR4700 is prone to an unspecified information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks. Netgear WNDR4700 running firmware 1.0.0.34 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-3071.title: Netgear WNDR4700 Router CVE-2013-3071 Remote Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3071.body: Netgear WNDR4700 routers are prone to a remote authentication-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass the authentication mechanism and gain unauthorized access to the restricted functionality of the device. NetGear WNDR4700 routers running firmware 1.0.0.34 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-3073.title: NetGear WNDR4700 CVE-2013-3073 Symlink Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3073.body: NetGear WNDR4700 is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Exploits would allow an attacker to access files outside of the restricted directory to obtain sensitive information and perform other attacks. NetGear WNDR4700 running firmware 1.0.0.34 is vulnerable.

CVE-2013-3245.title: VLC Media Player CVE-2013-3245 Remote Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3245.body: VLC Media Player is prone to a remote integer-overflow vulnerability. Attackers may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions. VLC Media Player 2.0.7 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-3253.title: WordPress Xhanch - My Twitter Plugin CVE-2013-3253 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3253.body: The Xhanch - My Twitter plugin for WordPress is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions in the context of the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Xhanch - My Twitter 2.7.5 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-3263.title: WordPress WP Ultimate Email Marketer Plugin Cross Site Scripting and Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-3263.body: The WP Ultimate Email Marketer plugin for WordPress is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities and multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities. An attacker may leverage the cross-site scripting issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. The attacker may leverage the security bypass issues to gain unauthorized access to the affected application and perform certain malicious actions. WP Ultimate Email Marketer version 1.1.0 is available; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-3264.title: WordPress WP Ultimate Email Marketer Plugin Cross Site Scripting and Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-3264.body: The WP Ultimate Email Marketer plugin for WordPress is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities and multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities. An attacker may leverage the cross-site scripting issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. The attacker may leverage the security bypass issues to gain unauthorized access to the affected application and perform certain malicious actions. WP Ultimate Email Marketer version 1.1.0 is available; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-3287.title: EMC Unisphere for VMAX Plain Text Password CVE-2013-3287 Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3287.body: EMC Unisphere for VMAX is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information and gain privileged access to the protected resources. This may lead to other attacks. EMC Unisphere for VMAX versions 1.0, 1.1, 1.5, 1.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-3304.title: Dell EqualLogic CVE-2013-3304 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3304.body: Dell EqualLogicis prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Exploiting this issue can allow an attacker to gain access to arbitrary system files. Information harvested may aid in launching further attacks. Dell EqualLogic Firmware versions 6.0 through 6.0.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-3311.title: Loftek Nexus 543 CVE-2013-3311 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3311.body: Loftek Nexus 543 is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. A remote attacker can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that could aid in further attacks.

CVE-2013-3314.title: Loftek Nexus 543 CVE-2013-3314 Multiple Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-3314.body: Loftek Nexus 543 is prone to multiple information-disclosure vulnerabilities. Successful exploits may allow attackers to disclose sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2013-3344.title: Adobe Flash Player CVE-2013-3344 Unspecified Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3344.body: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Note: This issue was previously covered in BID 61038 (Adobe Flash Player APSB13-17 Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities), but has been moved to its own record for better documentation. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the user running the affected application. Failed attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2013-3396.title: Cisco Content Security Management Appliance CVE-2013-3396 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3396.body: Cisco Content Security Management Appliance is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCuh24749 and CSCuh84596. Cisco Content Security Management Appliance 8.1.0 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-3448.title: Cisco WebEx Meetings Server CVE-2013-3448 Remote Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3448.body: Cisco WebEx Meetings Server is prone to a remote authentication-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass the authentication mechanism and gain unauthorized access to vulnerable application. This may lead to further attacks. This issue is tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCuh33315.

CVE-2013-3492.title: XnView CVE-2013-3492 Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3492.body: XnView is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied input before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. Successful exploits allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. XnView 2.03 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-3493.title: XnView CVE-2013-3493 Remote Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3493.body: XnView is prone to a remote integer-overflow vulnerability. Successful exploits allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. XnView 2.03 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-3572.title: Ubiquiti Networks UniFi Hostname Field HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3572.body: Ubiquiti Networks UniFi is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Ubiquiti Networks UniFi 2.3.5 and earlier are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-3622.title: Supermicro IPMI 'logout.cgi' Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3622.body: Supermicro IPMI is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Attackers may be able to execute arbitrary code with root privileges in the context of the affected firmware. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. Supermicro IPMI running firmware versions prior to SMT_X9_315 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-3623.title: Supermicro IPMI 'close_window.cgi' Multiple Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-3623.body: Supermicro IPMI is prone to multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Attackers may be able to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected firmware. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. Supermicro IPMI running firmware version SMT_X9_226 is vulnerable.

CVE-2013-3632.title: OpenMediaVault Cron Jobs Remote Arbitrary Command Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3632.body: OpenMediaVault is prone to a remote arbitrary command-execution vulnerability. An attacker can execute arbitrary commands with the privileges of the root user running the affected application.

CVE-2013-3706.title: Novell ZENworks Configuration Management CVE-2013-3706 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3706.body: Novell ZENworks Configuration Management is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information that could aid in further attacks. Novell ZENworks Configuration Management 11.2 is vulnerable.

CVE-2013-3739.title: Network Weathermap 'mapname' Parameter Local File Include Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3739.body: Network Weathermap is prone to a local file-include vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue to view files and execute arbitrary local PHP scripts with the privileges of the affected application. Network Weathermap 0.97C and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-3930.title: Core FTP 'CWD' Command CVE-2013-3930 Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3930.body: Core FTP is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. An attacker could exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. Core FTP 2.2 build 1778 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-3933.title: Joomla! JoomShopping Component 'user_name' Parameter HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3933.body: The JoomShopping component is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. JoomShopping 4.3.0 is vulnerable; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-3938.title: XnView JXR File Handling Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3938.body: XnView is prone to a remote heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied input before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. Successful exploits allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. XnView 2.13 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-3943.title: DotNetNuke Open-Redirection and HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-3943.body: DotNetNuke is prone to an open-redirection vulnerability and an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary script or HTML code, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, and conduct phishing attacks. Other attacks may also be possible. Versions prior to DotNetNuke 6.2.9 and 7.1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4100.title: Cryptocat CVE-2013-4100 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4100.body: Cryptocat is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. Cryptocat 2.0.21 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-4101.title: Cryptocat Link Markup Decorator 'addLinks()' Function Remote Security Weakness
CVE-2013-4101.body: Cryptocat is prone to a security weakness that affects the integrity security property of the application. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause the application to produce invalid HTML code, which may aid in exploiting other vulnerabilities. Versions prior to Cryptocat 2.0.22 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4103.title: Cryptocat CVE-2013-4103 Arbitrary Script Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4103.body: Cryptocat is prone to an arbitrary script-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary script code within the context of the application. Versions prior to Cryptocat 2.0.22 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4105.title: Cryptocat Multiparty Encryption Scheme Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4105.body: Cryptocat is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to break the encryption and gain access to sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. Versions prior to Cryptocat 2.0.22 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4106.title: Cryptocat CVE-2013-4106 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4106.body: Cryptocat is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Versions prior to Cryptocat 2.0.22 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4107.title: Cryptocat CVE-2013-4107 DOM Based Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4107.body: Cryptocat is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Versions prior to Cryptocat 2.0.22 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4109.title: Cryptocat CVE-2013-4109 Unspecified HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4109.body: Cryptocat is prone to an unspecified HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible. Cryptocat 1.1.165 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-4110.title: Cryptocat CVE-2013-4110 Unspecified Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4110.body: Cryptocat is prone to an unspecified information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2013-4176.title: mysecureshell 'SftpWho.c' Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4176.body: mysecureshell is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks. mysecureshell 1.31 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-4204.title: Google Web Toolkit CVE-2013-4204 Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4204.body: The Google Web Toolkit is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Google Web Toolkit 2.5.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-4289.title: OpenJPEG CVE-2013-4289 Multiple Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4289.body: OpenJPEG is prone to multiple heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2013-4290.title: OpenJPEG CVE-2013-4290 Multiple Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4290.body: OpenJPEG is prone to multiple stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2013-4295.title: Apache Shindig CVE-2013-4295 XML External Entity Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4295.body: Apache Shindig is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information; this may lead to further attacks. Apache Shindig 2.5.0 is vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4324.title: Red Hat 'spice-gtk' Module CVE-2013-4324 Local Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4324.body: Red Hat spice-gtk module is prone to a local security-bypass vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and gain elevated privileges.

CVE-2013-4378.title: JavaMelody 'X-Forwarded-For' Header Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4378.body: JavaMelody is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. JavaMelody 1.46 is vulnerable; other versions may be affected.

CVE-2013-4390.title: Apache Sling 'AbstractAuthenticationFormServlet' Open Redirection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4390.body: Apache Sling is prone to an open-redirection vulnerability. An attacker can leverage this issue by constructing a crafted URI and enticing a user to follow it. When an unsuspecting victim follows the link, they may be redirected to an attacker-controlled site; this may aid in phishing attacks. Other attacks are possible. Apache Sling 1.1.2 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4421.title: Dropbear SSH 'buf_decompress()' Function Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4421.body: Dropbear SSH is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to exhaust all available memory and cause a denial-of-service condition. Versions prior to Dropbear SSH 2013.59 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4434.title: Dropbear SSH 'svr-auth.c' User Enumeration Weakness
CVE-2013-4434.body: Dropbear SSH is prone to a user-enumeration weakness. An attacker may leverage this issue to harvest valid usernames, which may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2013-4462.title: WordPress Portable phpMyAdmin Plugin Multiple Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4462.body: The Portable phpMyAdmin plugin for WordPress is prone to multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities. Successfully exploiting these issues may allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions and obtain sensitive information such as WordPress database username and password. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2013-4575.title: Symantec Backup Exec CVE-2013-4575 Remote Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4575.body: Symantec Backup Exec is prone to a remote heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Attackers may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2013-4626.title: WordPress BackWPup Plugin 'tab' Parameter Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4626.body: The BackWPup plugin for WordPress is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. BackWPup 3.0.12 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-4669.title: Fortinet FortiClient VPN Client SSL Certificate Validation Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4669.body: Fortinet FortiClient VPN client is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because the application fails to properly validate SSL certificates from the server. An attacker can exploit this issue to perform man-in-the-middle attacks or impersonate trusted servers, which will aid in further attacks.

CVE-2013-4670.title: Symantec Web Gateway CVE-2013-4670 Cross Site Scripting and HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4670.body: Symantec Web Gateway is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability and an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Versions prior to Symantec Web Gateway 5.1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4671.title: Symantec Web Gateway CVE-2013-4671 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4671.body: Symantec Web Gateway is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected appliance. Other attacks are also possible. Versions prior to Symantec Web Gateway 5.1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4672.title: Symantec Web Gateway CVE-2013-4672 Remote Command Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4672.body: Symantec Web Gateway is prone to a vulnerability that can allow an attacker to execute arbitrary commands. Successful exploits will result in the execution of arbitrary commands with elevated privileges. Versions prior to Symantec Web Gateway 5.1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4676.title: Symantec Backup Exec CVE-2013-4676 Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4676.body: Symantec Backup Exec is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.

CVE-2013-4677.title: Symantec Backup Exec CVE-2013-4677 Local Insecure File Permissions Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4677.body: Symantec Backup Exec is prone to a local insecure-file-permissions vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to unauthorized access or elevated privileges on network systems.

CVE-2013-4678.title: Symantec Backup Exec CVE-2013-4678 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4678.body: Symantec Backup Exec is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2013-4679.title: Symantec Workspace Virtualization 'fslx.sys' Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4679.body: Symantec Workspace Virtualization is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM-level privileges. Symantec Workspace Virtualization 6.4.1895.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-4682.title: TYPO3 Multishop Extension Unspecified SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4682.body: Multishop for TYPO3 is prone to an unspecified SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Versions prior to Multishop 2.0.39 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4685.title: Juniper Networks Junos CVE-2013-4685 Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4685.body: Juniper Networks Junos is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability. Attackers may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected device. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2013-4689.title: Juniper Junos J-Web CVE-2013-4689 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4689.body: Juniper Junos is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to perform certain administrative actions and gain unauthorized access to the affected device. Juniper Junos 10.4, 11.4, 12.1, 12.1X44, 12.2, 12.3, and 13.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4730.title: PCMan's FTP Server 'USER' Command Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4730.body: PCMan's FTP Server is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker could exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2013-4778.title: Multiple Siemens OpenScape Products Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4778.body: Multiple Siemens OpenScape products are prone to multiple vulnerabilities including: 1. An information-disclosure vulnerability 2. Multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities 3. A local file-disclosure vulnerability 4. A command-injection vulnerability An attacker can exploit these issues to obtain sensitive information, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, or execute arbitrary commands in context of the web server. Other attacks may also be possible.

CVE-2013-4779.body: Multiple Siemens OpenScape products are prone to multiple vulnerabilities including: 1. An information-disclosure vulnerability 2. Multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities 3. A local file-disclosure vulnerability 4. A command-injection vulnerability An attacker can exploit these issues to obtain sensitive information, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, or execute arbitrary commands in context of the web server. Other attacks may also be possible.

CVE-2013-4780.body: Multiple Siemens OpenScape products are prone to multiple vulnerabilities including: 1. An information-disclosure vulnerability 2. Multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities 3. A local file-disclosure vulnerability 4. A command-injection vulnerability An attacker can exploit these issues to obtain sensitive information, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, or execute arbitrary commands in context of the web server. Other attacks may also be possible.

CVE-2013-4781.body: Multiple Siemens OpenScape products are prone to multiple vulnerabilities including: 1. An information-disclosure vulnerability 2. Multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities 3. A local file-disclosure vulnerability 4. A command-injection vulnerability An attacker can exploit these issues to obtain sensitive information, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, or execute arbitrary commands in context of the web server. CVE-2013-4787.title: Google Android 'APK' code Remote Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4787.body: Google Android is prone to a remote security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions to perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2013-4851.title: FreeBSD 'nfsserver' Module CVE-2013-4851 Access Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4851.body: FreeBSD is prone to a access-bypass vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and gain unauthorized access. FreeBSD 8.3, 9.0, and 9.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4858.title: Microsoft Windows Movie Maker '.wav' File Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4858.body: Microsoft Windows Movie Maker is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible; this has not been confirmed. Microsoft Windows Movie Maker 2.1.4026.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-4945.title: BMC Service Desk Express (SDE) Multiple SQL Injection and Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4945.body: BMC Service Desk Express (SDE) is prone to multiple SQL-injection and cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. Successful exploits could allow an attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. BMC Service Desk Express (SDE) 10.2.1.95 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-4946.title: BMC Service Desk Express (SDE) Multiple SQL Injection and Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4946.body: BMC Service Desk Express (SDE) is prone to multiple SQL-injection and cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. Successful exploits could allow an attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. BMC Service Desk Express (SDE) 10.2.1.95 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-4951.title: Mintboard Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4951.body: Mintboard is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Mintboard 0.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-4974.title: Real Networks RealPlayer CVE-2013-4974 Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4974.body: Real Networks RealPlayer is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. RealPlayer for Windows 16.0.2.32 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4978.title: Aloaha PDF Suite CVE-2013-4978 Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4978.body: Aloaha PDF Suite is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2013-4982.title: AVTECH AVN801 DVR CVE-2013-4982 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4982.body: AVTECH AVN801 is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue will allow attackers to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. AVTECH AVN801 running firmware version 1017-1003-1009-1003 is vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4995.title: phpMyAdmin CVE-2013-4995 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4995.body: phpMyAdmin is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary HTML or script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the application's user session. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. phpMyAdmin versions 3.5.x prior to 3.5.8.2 and 4.0.x prior to 4.0.4.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4996.title: phpMyAdmin CVE-2013-4996 Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4996.body: phpMyAdmin is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary HTML and script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Note: These issues were previously covered in BID 61493 (phpMyAdmin Multiple SQL Injection and Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities) but have been assigned their own record to better document it. phpMyAdmin 3.5.x prior to 3.5.8.2 and 4.0.x prior to 4.0.4.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-5002.body: phpMyAdmin is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary HTML or script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the application's user session. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. phpMyAdmin versions 3.5.x prior to 3.5.8.2 and 4.0.x prior to 4.0.4.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-5003.title: phpMyAdmin CVE-2013-5003 Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-5003.body: phpMyAdmin is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. phpMyAdmin 3.5.x prior to 3.5.8.2 and 4.0.x prior to 4.0.4.2 are vulnerable. Note: This issue was previously covered in BID 61493 (phpMyAdmin Multiple SQL Injection and Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities), but has been moved to its own record for better documentation.

CVE-2013-5005.body: Tripwire Enterprise is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. CVE-2013-5008.title: Symantec Management Platform Static Key Unauthorized Access Vulnerability
CVE-2013-5008.body: Symantec Management Platform is prone to an unauthorized-access vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attackers to gain unauthorized access and obtain potentially sensitive information or perform malicious actions. This may aid in further attacks. Symantec Management Platform 7.0 and 7.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-5012.title: Symantec Web Gateway CVE-2013-5012 Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-5012.body: Symantec Web Gateway is prone to multiple unspecified SQL-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Symantec Web Gateway 5.1.1 is vulnerable; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-5013.title: Symantec Web Gateway Multiple Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-5013.body: Symantec Web Gateway is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Symantec Web Gateway 5.1.1 is vulnerable; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-5015.title: Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager CVE-2013-5015 Local SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-5015.body: Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager is prone to a local SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. The following versions are vulnerable: Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager 11.0 Symantec Endpoint Protection Center Small Business Edition 12.0 Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager 12.1

CVE-2013-5016.body: Symantec Critical System Protection for Windows is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Symantec Critical System Protection for Windows 5.2.8 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-5018.title: strongSwan 'is_asn1()' Function Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-5018.body: strongSwan is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause an application to crash, denying service to legitimate users. strongSwan 5.0.3 and 5.0.4 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-5020.title: miniBB SQL Injection and Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-5020.body: miniBB is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability and multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. CVE-2013-5094.body: McAfee Vulnerability Manager is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability. CVE-2013-5117.body: The DNNArticle module for DotNetNuke is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. DNNArticle 10.0 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-5119.body: Zimbra Collaboration Suite is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to hijack web sessions or bypass authentication through a replay attack and gain access to a victim account. Zimbra Collaboration Suite 6.0.16 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-5120.body: phpFox is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. CVE-2013-5517.body: Cisco Unified Communications Domain Manager is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. An attacker can exploit this  issue by manipulating the SQL query  logic  to carry out unauthorized  actions on the underlying database. Successfully exploiting this issue may lead to remote code-execution; however, it has not been confirmed.                        The following versions are vulnerable:                                         McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator 4.5 through versions 4.5.6 are vulnerable             McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator 4.6 through versions 4.6.5 are vulnerable

CVE-2013-0168.title: Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager CVE-2013-0168 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-0168.body: Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability.                                                                                                                                                        An attacker can exploit this issue to consume excessive disk space, denying service to legitimate users.              Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager 3.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-0169.title: Multiple TLS And DTLS Implementations CVE-2013-0169 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-0169.body: Multiple implementations of TLS and DTLS are prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may aid in further attacks.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          The following applications are affected:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  OpenSSL                                                                                                                                                                                                 PolarSSL                                                                                                                                                                                                 OpenJDK

CVE-2013-0170.title: libvirt 'virNetMessageFree()' Function Use After Free Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2013-0170.body: libvirt is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability.                     Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the root user or trigger denial-of-service conditions. Other attacks may also be possible.

CVE-2013-0179.title: memcached Verbose Mode Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-0179.body: memcached is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability.                                       Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the application, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2013-0181.title: Drupal Search API Module Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-0181.body: The Search API module for Drupal is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.                                              An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.                                              Search API 7.x-1.x through versions prior to 7.x-1.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-0189.title: Squid 'cachemgr.cgi' Incomplete Fix Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-0189.body: Squid is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability.                          Successful exploits will cause an affected application to cause a memory leakage and terminate the application, denying service to legitimate users.          Note: This issue is the result of an incomplete fix for the issue described in BID 56957 (Squid 'cachemgr.cgi' Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability).

CVE-2013-0190.title: Xen 'xen_failsafe_callback()' Function Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-0190.body: Xen is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability.                                         Local attackers with access to a guest operating system can exploit this   issue to crash the guest operating system, effectively denying service to  legitimate users.                        Xen 2.6.23 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-0191.title: libpam-pgsql NULL Password Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-0191.body: libpam-pgsql is prone to a remote authentication-bypass vulnerability.      Remote attackers can exploit this issue to bypass the authentication mechanism and gain unauthorized access.

CVE-2013-0199.title: FreeIPA Cross-Realm Trust key Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-0199.body: FreeIPA is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability.                             Successful exploits may allow an attacker to gain access to sensitive information that may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2013-0208.body: OpenStack Compute (Nova) is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. OpenStack Compute (Nova) 2011.3, 2012.1 and 2012.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-0211.body: 'libarchive' is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability.                                  Local attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. Other attacks may be possible.

CVE-2013-0213.body: Samba is prone to a cross-site request forgery vulnerability and a clickjacking vulnerability. Samba versions 3.0 through 4.0.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-0234.title: Elgg 'params[twitter_username]' Parameter HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-0234.body: Elgg is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. CVE-2013-0238.title: IRCD-Hybrid 'try_parse_v4_netmask()' Denial of Service Vulnerability

CVE-2013-0242.title: GNU glibc 'regexec.c' Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-0242.body: GNU glibc is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow  vulnerability because the application fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer.                                                 An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2013-0247.body: Keystone is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability.               Successful exploits may allow an attacker to cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2013-0249.body: cURL/libcURL is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow  vulnerability because the application fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer.
