CVE-2013-0964.title: Apple iPhone/iPad/iPod touch Prior to iOS 6.1 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-0964.body: Apple iOS for the iPhone, the iPod touch, and the iPad is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability.                        An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2013-1052.title: Ubuntu 'pam-xdg-support' Module CVE-2013-1052 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1052.body: Ubuntu 'pam-xdg-support' module is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability.        Local attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application.

CVE-2013-1070.title: Ubuntu MAAS 'op' Parameter Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-1070.body: Ubuntu MAAS is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.      An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2013-1105.title: Cisco Wireless LAN Controller Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-1105.body: The Cisco Wireless LAN Controller is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities.               Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to deny service to legitimate users, execute arbitrary code, or gain unauthorized access. Other attacks may also be possible.

CVE-2013-1110.title: Cisco WebEx Training Center CVE-2013-1110 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1110.body: Cisco WebEx Training Center is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability.         Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass security restrictions to  perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2013-1113.title: Cisco Unified Communications Domain Manager Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1113.body: Cisco Unified Communications Domain Manager  is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability.                                                                               An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code  in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected  site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication  credentials and launch other attacks.                                                  This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCue21042.

CVE-2013-1123.title: Cisco Unified MeetingPlace CVE-2013-1123 Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1123.body: Cisco Unified MeetingPlace is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability.                                                                               An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code  in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected  site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication  credentials and launch other attacks.                                                  This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCuc65411.

CVE-2013-1348.title: Symfony YAML Component Multiple Remote PHP Code Execution Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-1348.body: The Symfony YAML component is prone to multiple remote PHP code-execution vulnerabilities.                                                                      An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary  malicious PHP code in the context of the affected application.

CVE-2013-1359.title: Multiple SonicWALL Products CVE-2013-1359 Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1359.body: Multiple SonicWALL products including Global Management System (GMS), ViewPoint, Universal Management Appliance (UMA), and Analyzer are prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability.                                            Attackers can exploit this issue to gain administrative access to the  web interface. This allows attackers to execute arbitrary code with  SYSTEM privileges that could fully compromise the system.                  The following versions are affected:                  GMS/Analyzer/UMA 7.0.x         GMS/ViewPoint/UMA 6.0.x         GMS/ViewPoint/UMA 5.1.x         GMS/ViewPoint 5.0.x         GMS/ViewPoint 4.1.x

CVE-2013-1360.title: Multiple SonicWALL Products CVE-2013-1360 Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1360.body: Multiple SonicWALL products including Global Management System (GMS), ViewPoint, Universal Management Appliance (UMA), and Analyzer are prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability.                                  Attackers can exploit this issue to gain administrative access to the  web interface that could fully compromise the system.        The following versions are affected:        GMS/Analyzer/UMA 7.0.x    GMS/ViewPoint/UMA 6.0.x    GMS/ViewPoint/UMA 5.1.x    GMS/ViewPoint 5.0.x    GMS/ViewPoint 4.1.x

CVE-2013-1364.title: Zabbix 'cnf' Parameter Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1364.body: Zabbix is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability.                                Remote attackers can exploit this issue to bypass the authentication mechanism and gain unauthorized access.                           Zabbix 2.0.4 and prior to 1.8.16 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-1393.title: Drupal CurvyCorners Module Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1393.body: The CurvyCorners module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied text.                                                  An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2013-1397.title: Symfony YAML Component Multiple Remote PHP Code Execution Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-1397.body: The Symfony YAML component is prone to multiple remote PHP code-execution vulnerabilities.                                                                      An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary  malicious PHP code in the context of the affected application.

CVE-2013-1400.title: WordPress Poll Plugin Multiple SQL Injection and Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-1400.body: The WordPress Poll Plugin for WordPress is prone to multiple SQL-injection and security-bypass vulnerabilities.                                                              Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2013-1401.title: WordPress Poll Plugin Multiple SQL Injection and Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-1401.body: The WordPress Poll Plugin for WordPress is prone to multiple SQL-injection and security-bypass vulnerabilities.                                                              Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2013-1408.title: WordPress Wysija Newsletters Plugin Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-1408.body: The Wysija Newsletters Plugin for WordPress is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities.                                                                                          Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.          Wysija Newsletters 2.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-1418.title: MIT Kerberos 5 'setup_server_realm()' Function CVE-2013-1418 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1418.body: MIT Kerberos 5 is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability in 'kadmind'. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the affected KDC service, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Kerberos 5 1.10.6, 1.11.3 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1427.title: lighttpd CVE-2013-1427 Insecure Temporary File Creation Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1427.body: lighttpd is prone to an insecure temporary-file-creation vulnerability. Local attackers may be able to perform symbolic-link attacks to overwrite arbitrary files in the context of the affected application. Other attacks may also be possible.

CVE-2013-1428.title: tinc CVE-2013-1428 Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1428.body: tinc is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may crash the application, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2013-1434.title: Cacti CVE-2013-1434 Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-1434.body: Cacti is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Versions prior to Cacti 0.8.8b are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1436.title: xmonad XMonad.Hooks.DynamicLog Module Multiple Remote Command Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-1436.body: XMonad.Hooks.DynamicLog module for xmonad is prone to multiple remote command-injection vulnerabilities. Successful exploits will result in the execution of arbitrary commands in the context of the affected applications. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2013-1463.title: WordPress WP-Table Reloaded Plugin 'id' Parameter Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1463.body: The WP-Table Reloaded plugin for WordPress is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. WP-Table Reloaded versions prior to 1.9.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1465.title: CubeCart PHP 'shipping' Parameter PHP Object Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1465.body: CubeCart is prone to a remote PHP object-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly validate user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit this issue to inject arbitrary object in to the application. This may aid in further attacks. CubeCart versions 5.0.0 through 5.2.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1493.title: Oracle Java SE CVE-2013-1493 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1493.body: Oracle Java SE is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. This vulnerability affects the following supported versions: JDK and JRE 7 Update 15 and prior JDK and JRE 6 Update 41 and prior JDK and JRE 5.0 Update 40 and prior

CVE-2013-1594.title: Multiple Vivotek IP Camera Products CVE-2013-1594 Information Disclosue Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1594.body: Multiple Vivotek IP Cameras products are prone to a information-disclosure vulnerability. Exploiting this issue could allow an unauthenticated attacker to gain access to potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2013-1596.title: Multiple Vivotek IP Camera Products CVE-2013-1596 Remote Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1596.body: Multiple Vivotek IP Camera products are prone to a remote authentication-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass the authentication mechanism and gain unauthorized access to the restricted functionality of the device.

CVE-2013-1597.title: Multiple Vivotek IP Camera Products CVE-2013-1597 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1597.body: Multiple Vivotek IP Camera products are prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using directory-traversal strings (such as '../') to gain access to arbitrary files and obtain sensitive information. Information obtained will aid in further attacks.

CVE-2013-1598.title: Multiple Vivotek IP Camera Products CVE-2013-1598 Command Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1598.body: Multiple Vivotek IP Camera products are prone to a command-injection vulnerability. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary commands in the context of the affected device.

CVE-2013-1599.title: Multiple D-Link Products CVE-2013-1599 Command Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1599.body: Multiple D-Link products are prone to a command-injection vulnerability. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary commands in the context of the affected device.

CVE-2013-1600.title: Multiple D-Link Products CVE-2013-1600 Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1600.body: Multiple D-Link products are prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to bypass the authentication mechanism and gain unauthorized access. http://drupal.org/node/207891

CVE-2013-1601.title: Multiple D-Link Products CVE-2013-1601 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1601.body: Multiple D-Link products are prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2013-1602.title: Multiple D-Link Products CVE-2013-1602 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1602.body: Multiple D-Link products are prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Exploiting this issue could allow an unauthenticated attacker to gain access to potentially sensitive information, such as a video stream.

CVE-2013-1604.title: MayGion IP Camera CVE-2013-1604 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1604.body: MayGion IP Camera is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue using directory-traversal strings to retrieve arbitrary files outside of the server root directory. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2013-1605.title: MayGion IP Camera CVE-2013-1605 Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1605.body: MayGion IP Camera is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary-checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2013-1620.title: Mozilla Network Security Services CVE-2013-1620 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1620.body: Mozilla Network Security Services (NSS) is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2013-1652.title: Puppet CVE-2013-1652 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1652.body: Puppet is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attackers to bypass certain security restrictions, which may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2013-1655.title: Puppet Serialized Attributes CVE-2013-1655 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1655.body: Puppet is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue will allow attackers to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application or cause denial-of-service conditions. The issue is fixed in Puppet versions 2.7.21 and 3.1.1.

CVE-2013-1667.title: Perl CVE-2013-1667 Input Rehashing Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1667.body: Perl is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attackers to cause a denial-of-service conditions. Perl versions 5.8.2 through 5.16.x are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1668.title: CosCMS 'index.php' Remote Command Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1668.body: CosCMS is prone to a remote command-injection vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary commands in the context of the application. CosCMS 1.721 is vulnerable; other versions may also be vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1670.title: Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird CVE-2013-1670 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1670.body: Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird are prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Note: This issue was previously discussed in BID 59852 (Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird MFSA 2013-41 through -48 Multiple Vulnerabilities), but has been moved to its own record for better documentation. This issue is fixed in: Firefox 21.0 Firefox ESR 17.0.6 Thunderbird 17.0.6 Thunderbird ESR 17.0.6

CVE-2013-1674.title: Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird CVE-2013-1674 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1674.body: Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird are prone to remote code execution vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary machine code in the context of the vulnerable application; failed exploit attempts will likely crash the application. Note: This issue was previously discussed in BID 59852 (Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird MFSA 2013-41 through -48 Multiple Vulnerabilities), but has been moved to its own record for better documentation. This issues are fixed in: Firefox 21.0 Firefox ESR 17.0.6 Thunderbird 17.0.6 Thunderbird ESR 17.0.6

CVE-2013-1675.title: Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird CVE-2013-1675 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1675.body: Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird are prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to disclose sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. Note: This issue was previously discussed in BID 59852 (Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird MFSA 2013-41 through -48 Multiple Vulnerabilities), but has been moved to its own record for better documentation. This issue is fixed in: Firefox 21.0 Firefox ESR 17.0.6 Thunderbird 17.0.6 Thunderbird ESR 17.0.6

CVE-2013-1676.title: Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird CVE-2013-1676 Out of Bounds Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1676.body: Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird are prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. Note: This issue was previously discussed in BID 59852 (Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird MFSA 2013-41 through -48 Multiple Vulnerabilities), but has been moved to its own record for better documentation. This issue is fixed in: Firefox 21.0 Firefox ESR 17.0.6 Thunderbird 17.0.6 Thunderbird ESR 17.0.6

CVE-2013-1677.title: Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird CVE-2013-1677 Out of Bounds Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1677.body: Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird are prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. Note: This issue was previously discussed in BID 59852 (Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird MFSA 2013-41 through -48 Multiple Vulnerabilities), but has been moved to its own record for better documentation. This issue is fixed in: Firefox 21.0 Firefox ESR 17.0.6 Thunderbird 17.0.6 Thunderbird ESR 17.0.6

CVE-2013-1678.title: Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird CVE-2013-1678 Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1678.body: Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird are prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. Note: This issue was previously discussed in BID 59852 (Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird MFSA 2013-41 through -48 Multiple Vulnerabilities), but has been moved to its own record for better documentation. This issue is fixed in: Firefox 21.0 Firefox ESR 17.0.6 Thunderbird 17.0.6 Thunderbird ESR 17.0.6

CVE-2013-1679.title: Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird CVE-2013-1679 Use After Free Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1679.body: Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird are prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. Note: This issue was previously discussed in BID 59852 (Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird MFSA 2013-41 through -48 Multiple Vulnerabilities), but has been moved to its own record for better documentation. This issue is fixed in: Firefox 21.0 Firefox ESR 17.0.6 Thunderbird 17.0.6 Thunderbird ESR 17.0.6

CVE-2013-1680.title: Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird CVE-2013-1680 Use After Free Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1680.body: Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird are prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. CVE-2013-1697.body: Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird are prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks. Note: This issue was previously discussed in BID 60762 (Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird MFSA 2013-49 through -62 Multiple Vulnerabilities), but has been moved to its own record for better documentation. CVE-2013-1709.title: Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/SeaMonkey CVE-2013-1709 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1709.body: Mozilla Firefox, SeaMonkey, and Thunderbird are prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Note: This issue was previously discussed in BID 61641 (Mozilla firefox/Thunderbird/SeaMonkey MFSA 2013-63 through -75 Multiple Vulnerabilities), but has been moved to its own record for better documentation. The issue is fixed in: Firefox 23.0 Firefox ESR 17.0.8 Thunderbird 17.0.8 Thunderbird ESR 17.0.8 Seamonkey 2.20

CVE-2013-1710.title: Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/SeaMonkey CVE-2013-1710 Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1710.body: Mozilla Firefox, SeaMonkey, and Thunderbird are prone to an arbitrary code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the vulnerable application, execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of a targeted site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Note: This issue was previously discussed in BID 61641 (Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/SeaMonkey MFSA 2013-63 through -75 Multiple Vulnerabilities), but has been moved to its own record for better documentation. These issues are fixed in: Firefox 23.0 Firefox ESR 17.0.8 Thunderbird 17.0.8 Thunderbird ESR 17.0.8 Seamonkey 2.20

CVE-2013-1713.title: Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/SeaMonkey CVE-2013-1713 Same Origin Policy Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1713.body: Mozilla Firefox, SeaMonkey, and Thunderbird are prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass the same-origin policy and certain access restrictions to access data, or execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of another site. This could be used to steal sensitive information or launch other attacks. These issues are fixed in: Firefox 23.0 Firefox ESR 17.0.8 Thunderbird 17.0.8 Thunderbird ESR 17.0.8 Seamonkey 2.20 Note: This issue was previously discussed in BID 61641 (Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/SeaMonkey MFSA 2013-63 through -75 Multiple Vulnerabilities), but has been moved to its own record for better documentation.

This could be used to steal sensitive information or launch other attacks. These issues are fixed in: Firefox 23.0 Firefox ESR 17.0.8 Thunderbird 17.0.8 Thunderbird ESR 17.0.8 Seamonkey 2.20 Note: This issue was previously discussed in BID 61641 (Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/SeaMonkey MFSA 2013-63 through -75 Multiple Vulnerabilities), but has been moved to its own record for better documentation.

CVE-2013-1740.title: Network Security Services 'ssl_Do1stHandshake()' Function Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1740.body: Network Security Services is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. Versions prior to Network Security Services 3.15.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1741.title: Mozilla Network Security Services CVE-2013-1741 Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1741.body: Mozilla Network Security Services is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application. This may result in denial-of-service conditions. Mozilla Network Security Services 3.15.2 is vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1756.title: Ruby dragonfly Gem CVE-2013-1756 Remote Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1756.body: dragonfly is prone to a remote arbitrary code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. dragonfly 0.7.0 and 0.9.12 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-1760.title: The Bug Genie Multiple Cross Site Scripting and HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-1760.body: The Bug Genie is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities and a HTML-injection vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2013-1766.title: libvirt CVE-2013-1766 Local Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1766.body: libvirt is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. libvirt 1.0.2-2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-1768.title: Apache OpenJPA Object Deserialization Arbitrary File Creation or Overwrite Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1768.body: Apache OpenJPA is prone to a vulnerability that allows attackers to write or overwrite arbitrary files on a vulnerable computer. An attacker can exploit this issue to create or overwrite arbitrary files on the computer running the affected application. This may aid in further attacks. The following products are affected: OpenJPA 1.0.0 through 1.0.4 OpenJPA 1.1.0 OpenJPA 1.3.0 OpenJPA 1.2.0 through 1.2.2 OpenJPA 2.0.0 through 2.0.1 OpenJPA 2.1.0 through 2.1.1 OpenJPA 2.2.0 through 2.2.1

CVE-2013-1773.title: Linux Kernel VFAT Filesystem Local Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1773.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local buffer-overflow vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to run arbitrary code with elevated privileges. Failed exploit attempts can crash the affected kernel, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2013-1775.title: Todd Miller Sudo CVE-2013-1775 Local Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1775.body: Todd Miller 'sudo' is prone to a local authentication-bypass vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to bypass authentication mechanism and gain unauthorized access. Successful exploits may lead to other attacks. This issue affects 'sudo' 1.6.0 through 1.7.10p6 and 'sudo' 1.8.0 through 1.8.6p6.

CVE-2013-1776.title: Todd Miller Sudo CVE-2013-1776 Local Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1776.body: Todd Miller 'sudo' is prone to a local security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This issue affects 'sudo' 1.3.5 through 1.7.10p5 and sudo 1.8.0 through 1.8.6p6. Note: An attacker requires the 'tty_tickets' option to enable in versions prior to sudo 1.7.4..

CVE-2013-1780.title: Drupal Best Responsive Theme HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1780.body: The Best Responsive theme for Drupal is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Best Responsive 7.x-1.x versions prior to 7.x-1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1782.title: Drupal Responsive Blog Theme HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1782.body: Responsive Blog Theme for Drupal is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Responsive Blog Theme 7.x-1.x versions prior to 7.x-1.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1783.title: Drupal Business Theme Slide Gallery HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1783.body: The Business Theme for Drupal is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied text. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Versions prior to Business Theme 7.x-1.8 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1794.title: OpenAFS CVE-2013-1794 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1794.body: OpenAFS is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data before copying it into a fixed-length buffer. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the application. Versions prior to OpenAFS 1.6.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1795.title: OpenAFS CVE-2013-1795 Remote Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1795.body: OpenAFS is prone to a remote integer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the application. Versions prior to OpenAFS 1.6.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1796.title: Linux Kernel KVM CVE-2013-1796 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1796.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to corrupt the host kernel memory. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2013-1801.title: Ruby HTTParty CVE-2013-1801 Parameter Parsing Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1801.body: HTTParty is prone to a parameter parsing vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to bypass certain security restrictions, execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application, exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database, deny service to legitimate users, or perform unauthorized actions. Other attacks are also possible. HTTParty versions 0.9.0 and prior are affected.

CVE-2013-1808.title: ZeroClipboard 'ZeroClipboard10.swf' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1808.body: ZeroClipboard is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to ZeroClipboard 1.1.7 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1816.title: MediaWiki CVE-2013-1816 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1816.body: MediaWiki is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause an application to crash, denying service to legitimate users. Versions prior to MediaWiki 1.19.4 and 1.20.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1817.title: MediaWiki CVE-2013-1817 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1817.body: MediaWiki is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks. Versions prior to MediaWiki 1.19.4 and 1.20.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1818.title: MediaWiki 'mwdoc-filter.php' Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1818.body: MediaWiki is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks. Versions prior to MediaWiki 1.20.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1821.title: Ruby REXML Parser Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1821.body: Ruby is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attackers to consume large amounts of memory and cause a crash through a specially crafted XML document. Versions prior to Ruby 1.9.3-p392 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1838.title: OpenStack Nova CVE-2013-1838 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1838.body: Nova is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to trigger denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2013-1840.title: OpenStack Glance CVE-2013-1840 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1840.body: Glance is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2013-1841.title: Net-Server 'allow_deny()' Function Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1841.body: Net-Server is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions which may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2013-1842.title: TYPO3 CVE-2013-1843 Open Redirection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1842.body: TYPO3 is prone to an open-redirection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can leverage this issue by constructing a crafted URI and enticing a user to follow it. When an unsuspecting victim follows the link, they may be redirected to an attacker-controlled site; this may aid in phishing attacks. Other attacks are possible. NOTE: The issue (described by CVE-2013-1842) has been moved to BID 60312 (TYPO3 CVE-2013-1842 SQL Injection Vulnerability) to better document it.

CVE-2013-1843.title: TYPO3 CVE-2013-1843 Open Redirection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1843.body: TYPO3 is prone to an open-redirection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can leverage this issue by constructing a crafted URI and enticing a user to follow it. When an unsuspecting victim follows the link, they may be redirected to an attacker-controlled site; this may aid in phishing attacks. Other attacks are possible. NOTE: The issue (described by CVE-2013-1842) has been moved to BID 60312 (TYPO3 CVE-2013-1842 SQL Injection Vulnerability) to better document it.

CVE-2013-1860.title: Linux Kernel 'cdc-wdm' USB Device Driver Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1860.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges, facilitating the complete compromise of affected computers. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the kernel, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2013-1861.title: MySQL and MariaDB Geometry Query Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1861.body: MySQL and MariaDB are prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the database, denying access to legitimate users.

CVE-2013-1862.title: Apache HTTP Server Terminal Escape Sequence in Logs Command Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1862.body: Apache HTTP Server is prone to a command-injection vulnerability because it fails to adequately sanitize user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary commands in the context of the application.

CVE-2013-1864.title: PTLib CVE-2013-1864 XML Parsing Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1864.body: PTLib is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to cause an affected application to consume excessive amounts of memory and CPU, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. Versions prior to PTLib 2.12.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1865.title: OpenStack Keystone PKI Tokens Validation Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1865.body: Keystone is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow authenticated attackers to bypass certain intended security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions which may aid in launching further attacks. Keystone (Folsom) is affected; other versions may also be vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1872.title: Mesa Out of Bounds CVE-2013-1872 Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1872.body: Mesa is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application using the affected library or cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2013-1879.title: ActiveMQ Cron Jobs CVE-2013-1879 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1879.body: ActiveMQ is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible. ActiveMQ 5.8.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1880.title: Apache ActiveMQ 'refresh' Parameter Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1880.body: ActiveMQ is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. ActiveMQ versions prior to 5.9.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1883.title: MantisBT 'filter_api.php' Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1883.body: MantisBT is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause an affected application to crash, denying service to legitimate users. MantisBT 1.2.12 through 1.2.14 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-1887.title: Drupal Views Module Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1887.body: The Views module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Views 7.x-3.x versions prior to 7.x-3.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1890.title: ownCloud CVE-2013-1890 Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-1890.body: ownCloud is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2013-1893.title: ownCloud 'addressbookprovider.php' Script SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1893.body: ownCloud is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Versions prior to ownCloud 5.0.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1896.title: Apache HTTP Server CVE-2013-1896 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1896.body: Apache HTTP Server is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2013-1905.title: Drupal Zero Point Module Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1905.body: The Zero Point module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Zero Point 7.x-1.x versions prior to 7.x-1.9 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1910.title: Yum Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1910.body: Yum is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions for legitimate users. Yum 3.4.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-1911.title: RubyGems 'ldoce' CVE-2013-1911 Remote Command Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1911.body: ldoce is prone to a remote command-execution vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary commands in the context of the affected application. ldoce 0.0.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-1912.title: HAProxy 'tcp-request content' CVE-2013-1912 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1912.body: HAProxy is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform boundary checks before copying user-supplied data to insufficiently sized memory buffer. An attacker may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code or corrupt memory process. Failed exploits may result in denial-of-service conditions. HAProxy versions prior to 1.4.23 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1913.title: GIMP XWD File Handling CVE-2013-1913 Heap-Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1913.body: GIMP is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2013-1914.title: GNU glibc 'getaddrinfo()'  Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1914.body: GNU glibc is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may crash the application, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2013-1918.title: Xen Page Table Manipulation CVE-2013-1918 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1918.body: Xen is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Local attackers with access to a guest operating system can exploit this issue to crash the host operating system, effectively denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2013-1919.title: Xen CVE-2013-1919 Multiple Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-1919.body: Xen is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities. Exploiting these issues allows remote attackers to trigger denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2013-1920.title: Xen CVE-2013-1920 Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1920.body: Xen is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed attacks may cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2013-1923.title: nfs-utils 'rpc.gssd' DNS Spoofing Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1923.body: rpc.gssd in nfs-utils is prone to a security vulnerability that may allow attackers to conduct spoofing attacks. Attackers can exploit this issue to conduct man-in-the-middle attacks and disclose sensitive information.

CVE-2013-1930.title: MantisBT 'Close' Button Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1930.body: MantisBT is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions, which may lead to further attacks. MantisBT 1.2.12 and later are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1931.title: MantisBT 'manage_proj_ver_delete.php' HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1931.body: MantisBT is prone to a HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied data. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. MantisBT 1.2.14 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-1932.title: MantisBT 'adm_config_report.php' HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1932.body: MantisBT is prone to a HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied data. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. MantisBT 1.2.0rc1 and later are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1942.title: jPlayer 'Jplayer.swf' Script Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1942.body: jPlayer is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2013-1944.title: cURL/libcURL 'tailmatch()' Function Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1944.body: cURL/libcURL is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks. Versions prior to cURL/libcURL 7.30.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1951.title: MediaWiki Multiple Remote Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-1951.body: MediaWiki is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability, a security-bypass vulnerability, and a remote file-include vulnerability. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute remote files within the context of the web server process, execute arbitrary script code in the context of the website, steal cookie-based authentication information, disclose sensitive information, or bypass certain security restrictions. Versions prior to MediaWiki 1.20.4 and 1.19.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1952.title: Xen CVE-2013-1952 Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1952.body: Xen is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. Local attackers with access to a guest operating system can exploit this issue to crash the host operating system, effectively denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2013-1960.title: LibTIFF 't2_process_jpeg_strip()' Function Heap-based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1960.body: The LibTIFF is prone to a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application using the affected library. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the application.

CVE-2013-1961.title: LibTIFF CVE-2013-1961 Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1961.body: LibTIFF is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the application that uses the affected library, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2013-1962.title: libvirt CVE-2013-1962 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1962.body: libvirt is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the application that uses the affected library, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2013-1964.title: Xen CVE-2013-1964 Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1964.body: Xen is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Local attackers with access to a guest operating system can exploit this issue to crash the host operating system, effectively denying service to legitimate users. Due to the nature of this issue an information-disclosure or a privilege-escalation may be possible, however this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2013-1965.title: Apache Struts 'ParameterInterceptor' Class OGNL CVE-2013-1965 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1965.body: Apache Struts is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because it fails to adequately handle user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit this issue to manipulate server-side context objects with the privileges of the user running the application. Successful exploits can compromise the application and possibly the underlying computer. This issue is related to the vulnerability documented in BID 32101(XWork 'ParameterInterceptor' Class OGNL Security Bypass Vulnerability). Apache Struts versions 2.0.0 through 2.3.14 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1966.title: Apache Struts 'includeParams' CVE-2013-1966 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1966.body: Apache Struts is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because it fails to adequately handle user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit this issue to manipulate server-side context objects with the privileges of the user running the application. Successful exploits can compromise the application and possibly the underlying computer. Apache Struts versions 2.0.0 through 2.3.14 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1971.title: Drupal MP3 Player Module Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1971.body: The MP3 Player module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied text. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2013-1978.title: GIMP XWD File Handling Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1978.body: GIMP is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds check user-supplied input. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. GIMP 2.8.10 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-1980.title: libxmp 'get_dsmp()' Function Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1980.body: libxmp is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to libxmp 4.1.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1981.title: X.Org libX11 CVE-2013-1981 Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-1981.body: The 'libX11' library is prone to multiple remote code-execution vulnerabilities because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit these vulnerabilities to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to libX11 1.5.99.902 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1987.title: X.Org libXrender CVE-2013-1987 Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-1987.body: The 'libXrender' library is prone to multiple remote code-execution vulnerabilities because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit these vulnerabilities to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to libXrender 0.9.8 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1995.title: X.Org libXi 'XListInputDevices()' Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1995.body: The 'libXi' library is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the user running the X client. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to libXi 1.7.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1996.title: X.Org libFS 'FSOpenServer()' Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2013-1996.body: The 'libFS' library is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the user running the X client. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to libFS 1.0.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-1998.title: X.Org libXi CVE-2013-1998 Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-1998.body: The 'libXi' library is prone to multiple remote code-execution vulnerabilities because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of the user running the X client. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to libXi 1.7.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2002.title: X.Org libXt '_XtResourceConfigurationEH()' Function Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2002.body: The 'libXt' library is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to libXt 1.1.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2003.title: X.Org libXcursor '_XcursorFileHeaderCreate()' Function Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2003.body: The 'libXcursor' library is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to libXcursor 1.1.14 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2005.title: X.Org libXt CVE-2013-2005 Multiple Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-2005.body: The 'libXt' library is prone to multiple memory-corruption vulnerabilities because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the user running the X client. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to libXt 1.1.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2006.title: OpenStack Keystone CVE-2013-2006 LDAP Password Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2006.body: Keystone is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow attackers to obtain sensitive information such as LDAP passwords that may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2013-2007.title: QEMU Guest Agent CVE-2013-2007 Insecure File Permissions Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2007.body: QEMU is prone to an insecure file-permission vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to obtain potentially sensitive information and modify or delete logs. Information obtained may aid in further attacks. QEMU 1.4.1 and prior are vulnerable. Note: This issue was previously titled 'Xen 'qemu-ga' CVE-2013-2007 Insecure File Permissions Vulnerability'. The title and technical details have been changed to better reflect the underlying component affected.

CVE-2013-2014.title: OpenStack Keystone CVE-2013-2014 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2014.body: Keystone is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2013-2016.title: QEMU CVE-2013-2016 Out of Bounds Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2016.body: QEMU is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges on the host operating system. Successful exploits will result in the complete compromise of affected computers.

CVE-2013-2019.title: BOINC CVE-2013-2019 Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulerability
CVE-2013-2019.body: BOINC is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions. Note: This issue was previously covered in BID 59542 (BOINC Multiple Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it.

CVE-2013-2020.title: ClamAV Remote Code Execution And Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-2020.body: ClamAV is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability and a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successfully exploiting these issues may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of affected application or cause denial-of-service conditions. ClamAV versions prior to 0.97.8 are vulnerable. NOTE: This BID initially referenced CVE-2013-2021. This issue is now described in BID 60118.

CVE-2013-2021.title: ClamAV Remote Code Execution And Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-2021.body: ClamAV is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability and a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successfully exploiting these issues may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of affected application or cause denial-of-service conditions. ClamAV versions prior to 0.97.8 are vulnerable. NOTE: This BID initially referenced CVE-2013-2021. This issue is now described in BID 60118.

CVE-2013-2024.title: CHICKEN 'qs' Function Local Command Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2024.body: CHICKEN is prone to a local command-injection vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary commands within the context of the affected application. Successful exploits may compromise the affected computer.

CVE-2013-2025.title: Ushahidi Unspecified HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2025.body: Ushahidi is prone to an unspecified HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2013-2028.title: nginx 'ngx_http_parse.c' Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2028.body: nginx is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. The issue is fixed in nginx 1.4.1 and 1.5.0.

CVE-2013-2031.title: Mediawiki 'SVG' Files Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2031.body: Mediawiki is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to Mediawiki 1.20.5 and 1.19.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2037.title: python-httplib2 CVE-2013-2037 SSL Certificate Validation Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2037.body: python-httplib2 is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to perform man-in-the-middle attacks or impersonate trusted servers, which will aid in further attacks. python-httplib2 versions prior to 0.7.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2050.title: Red Hat CloudForms Management Engine 'MiqPolicyController' Component SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2050.body: Red Hat CloudForms Management Engine is prone to SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. CloudForms Management Engine 2.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-2051.title: Apache Tomcat DIGEST Authentication CVE-2013-2051 Incomplete Fix Security Weakness
CVE-2013-2051.body: Apache Tomcat is prone to a security weakness. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. Note: This issue is the result of an incomplete fix for the issue (CVE-2012-5887) described in BID 56403 (Apache Tomcat DIGEST Authentication Multiple Security Weaknesses). This issue affects the following versions: Tomcat 7.0.0 through 7.0.30 Tomcat 6.0.0 through 6.0.36 Tomcat 5.5.0 through 5.5.36

CVE-2013-2053.title: Openswan CVE-2013-2053 DNS TXT Record Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2053.body: Openswan is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application or cause the application to crash, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Openswan 1.0 through 2.6.38 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2059.title: OpenStack Keystone Tokens Validation Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2059.body: Keystone is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow authenticated attackers to bypass certain intended security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions which may aid in launching further attacks. The following versions are affected: Keystone (Folsom) Keystone (Havana) Keystone (Grizzly)

CVE-2013-2060.title: Red Hat OpenShift Origin CVE-2013-2060 Remote Command Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2060.body: Red Hat OpenShift Origin is prone to a remote command-execution vulnerability . Successful exploits may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary commands in the context of the affected application.

CVE-2013-2064.title: X.Org libxcb 'read_packet()' Function Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2064.body: The 'libxcb' library is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerabilities because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the user running the X client. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to libxcb 1.9.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2067.title: Apache Tomcat CVE-2013-2067 Session Fixation Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2067.body: Apache Tomcat is prone to a session-fixation vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to hijack an arbitrary session and gain unauthorized access to the affected application. The following versions are vulnerable: Tomcat 7.0.0 through 7.0.32 Tomcat 6.0.0 through 6.0.36

CVE-2013-2069.title: Red Hat 'livecd-tools' CVE-2013-2069 Local Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2069.body: Red Hat 'livecd-tools' is prone to a local security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and gain access to the root account.

CVE-2013-2071.title: Apache Tomcat CVE-2013-2071 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2071.body: Apache Tomcat is prone to a remote information-disclosure vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information. Tomcat versions 7.0.0 through 7.0.39 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2072.title: Xen 'xc_vcpu_setaffinity()' Function Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2072.body: Xen is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on the user-supplied data. An attacker with access to a guest operating system can exploit this issue to crash the host operating system, effectively denying service to legitimate users. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code-execution with elevated privileges is also possible.

CVE-2013-2096.title: OpenStack Compute (Nova) CVE-2013-2096 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2096.body: OpenStack Compute (Nova) is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2013-2100.title: Portage 'urlopen()' SSL Certificate Validation Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2100.body: Portage is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because the application fails to properly validate SSL certificates from the server. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to perform man-in-the-middle attacks or impersonate trusted servers, which will aid in further attacks.

CVE-2013-2108.title: WordPress WP Cleanfix Plugin Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2108.body: The WP cleanfix plugin for WordPress is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions in the context of the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. WP cleanfix 2.4.4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-2110.title: PHP CVE-2013-2110 Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2110.body: PHP is prone to a remote heap-based buffer-overflow because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to PHP 5.4.16 and 5.3.26 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2115.title: Apache Struts 'includeParams' CVE-2013-2115 Incomplete Fix Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2115.body: Apache Struts is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because it fails to adequately handle user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit this issue to manipulate server-side context objects with the privileges of the user running the application. Successful exploits can compromise the application and possibly the underlying computer. Apache Struts versions 2.0.0 through 2.3.14.1 are vulnerable. Note: This issue is the result of an incomplete fix for the issue described in BID 60166 (Apache Struts 'includeParams' CVE-2013-1966 Security Bypass Vulnerability).

CVE-2013-2122.title: Drupal Edit Limit Module Access Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2122.body: The Edit Limit module for Drupal is prone to an access-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. Edit Limit 7.x-1.x versions prior to 7.x-1.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2129.title: Drupal Webform Module Components Label HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2129.body: The Webform module for Drupal is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Webform 6.x-3.x versions prior to 6.x-3.19 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2134.title: Apache Struts CVE-2013-2134 OGNL Expression Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2134.body: Apache Struts is prone to a remote OGNL expression injection vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to manipulate server-side objects and execute arbitrary commands within the context of the application. Apache Struts 2.0.0 through versions 2.3.14.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2136.title: Apache CloudStack CVE-2013-2136 Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-2136.body: Apache CloudStack is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Apache CloudStack 4.0.0-incubating, 4.0.1-incubating 4.0.2, and 4.1.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2137.title: Apache OFBiz CVE-2013-2317 'View Log' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2137.body: Apache OFBiz is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary HTML and script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. The following Apache OFBiz versions are affected: Apache OFBiz 10.04.01 to 10.04.05 Apache OFBiz 11.04.01 to 11.04.02 Apache OFBiz 12.04.01

CVE-2013-2145.title: Module::Signature CVE-2013-2145 Local Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2145.body: Module::Signature is prone to a local arbitrary code-execution vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the user running the affected application. Module::Signature versions prior to 0.72 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2158.title: Drupal Services Module Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2158.body: The Services module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. The following versions are affected: Services 6.x-3.x versions Services 7.x-3.x versions prior to 7.x-3.4

CVE-2013-2159.title: Monkey HTTP Daemon CVE-2013-2159 Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2159.body: Monkey HTTP Daemon is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to gain unauthorized access to the affected application and disclose sensitive information.

CVE-2013-2163.title: Monkey HTTP Daemon Multiple Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-2163.body: Monkey HTTP Daemon is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities. Successfully exploiting these issues may allow the attacker to cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2013-2168.title: D-Bus '_dbus_printf_string_upper_bound()' Function Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2168.body: D-Bus is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to cause the application to crash, resulting in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2013-2172.title: Apache Santuario XML Security for JAVA XML Signature CVE-2013-2172 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2172.body: Apache Santuario XML Security for JAVA is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass the signature verification process and perform unauthorized actions. The following versions are vulnerable: Apache Santuario XML Security for JAVA 1.4.x prior to 1.4.8 Apache Santuario XML Security for JAVA 1.5.x prior to 1.5.5

CVE-2013-2174.title: cURL/libcURL 'curl_easy_unescape()' Heap Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2174.body: cURL/libcURL is prone to a heap-memory-corruption vulnerability because it fails to properly perform bounds check on user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application or cause denial-of-service conditions; other attacks may also be possible. cURL versions 7.7 through 7.30.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2182.title: Monkey HTTP Daemon Mandril Security Plugin CVE-2013-2182 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2182.body: The Mandril Security plugin for Monkey HTTP Daemon is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions, which may aid in launching further attacks

CVE-2013-2186.title: Apache Commons FileUpload 'DiskFileItem' Class Null Byte Arbitrary File Write Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2186.body: Apache Commons FileUpload is prone to an arbitrary file-write vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to write or overwrite arbitrary files in the context of the web server, which may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2013-2187.title: Apache Archiva CVE-2013-2187 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2187.body: Apache Archiva is prone to an unspecified HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker-supplied HTML and script code would run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing an attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible. Archiva 1.3 through 1.3.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2205.title: WordPress 'SWFUpload' Library CVE-2013-2205 Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-2205.body: WordPress is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. WordPress 3.5 and 3.5.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2236.title: Quagga CVE-2013-2236 Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2236.body: Quagga is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly validate user-supplied input before copying it into a fixed-length buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions. Quagga 0.99.22 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-2250.title: Apache OFBiz Nested Expression Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2250.body: Apache OFBiz is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. A remote attacker can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. The following products are vulnerable: Apache OFBiz 10.04.01 through 10.04.05 Apache OFBiz 11.04.01 through 11.04.02 Apache OFBiz 12.04.01
