CVE-2013-2251.title: Apache Struts CVE-2013-2251 Multiple Remote Command Execution Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-2251.body: Apache Struts is prone to multiple remote command-execution vulnerabilities. Successful exploits will allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands within the context of the affected application. Apache Struts 2.0.0 prior to 2.3.15.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2254.title: Apache Sling 'deepGetOrCreateNode()' Function Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2254.body: Apache Sling is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. Apache Sling 2.2.0 and 2.3.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2266.title: ISC BIND 9 'libdns' Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2266.body: ISC BIND is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users. The following are affected: ISC BIND 9.7.x ISC BIND 9.8.0 through versions 9.8.5-b1 ISC BIND 9.9.0 through versions 9.9.3-b1

CVE-2013-2267.title: FUDforum CVE-2013-2267 Multiple Remote PHP Code Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-2267.body: FUDforum is prone to multiple vulnerabilities that attackers can leverage to execute arbitrary PHP code because the application fails to adequately sanitize user-supplied input. Attackers may exploit these issues to execute arbitrary PHP code within the context of the affected application. Successful attacks can compromise the affected application and possibly the underlying computer. FUDforum 3.0.4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-2270.title: Airvana HubBub C1-600-RT Router CVE-2013-2270 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2270.body: Airvana HubBub C1-600-RT router is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied data. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.

CVE-2013-2290.title: Aruba Networks ArubaOS CVE-2013-2290 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2290.body: Aruba Networks ArubaOS is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2013-2298.title: BOINC CVE-2013-2298 Multiple Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulerabilities
CVE-2013-2298.body: BOINC is prone to multiple stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2013-2474.title: AWS XMS 'what' Parameter Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2474.body: AWS XMS is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. A remote attacker can use directory-traversal strings to read arbitrary files in the context of the affected application. AWS XMS 2.5 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-2492.title: Firebird CVE-2013-2492 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2492.body: Firebird is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2013-2499.title: SimpleHRM 'user_manager.php' Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2499.body: SimpleHRM is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to bypass the authentication process to access information without proper authentication. Versions prior to SimpleHRM 2.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2501.title: WordPress Terillion Reviews Plugin Profile Id HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2501.body: The Terillion Reviews plugin for WordPress is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2013-2559.title: Symphony 'sort' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2559.body: Symphony is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Symphony 2.3.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-2568.title: Zavio IP Cameras CVE-2013-2568 Arbitrary Command Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2568.body: Zavio IP Cameras are prone to a remote arbitrary command-injection vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attackers to execute arbitrary commands in the context of the affected application. This may further aid in other attacks. Zavio IP Cameras running firmware version 1.6.03 and below are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2569.title: Zavio IP Cameras CVE-2013-2569 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2569.body: Zavio IP Cameras are prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. Zavio IP Cameras running firmware version 1.6.03 and below are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2570.title: Zavio IP Cameras CVE-2013-2570 Command Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2570.body: Zavio IP Cameras are prone to a command-injection vulnerability. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary commands in the context of the affected device. Zavio IP Cameras running firmware version 1.6.03 and below are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2571.title: XPIENT IRIS CVE-2013-2571 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2571.body: XPIENT IRIS extension is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successful exploits allow attackers to bypass certain security restrictions that may aid in further attacks. XPIENT IRIS 3.8 build 1052 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-2573.title: TP-LINK IP Cameras CVE-2013-2573 Command Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2573.body: TP-LINK IP Cameras are prone to a command-injection vulnerability. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary commands in the context of the affected device. TP-LINK IP Cameras running firmware version 1.6.18P12 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2586.title: XAMPP CVE-2013-2586 Arbitrary File Write Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2586.body: XAMPP is prone to a vulnerability that let attackers write or overwrite arbitrary files. An attacker can exploit this issue to write or overwrite arbitrary files in the context of the web server, which may aid in further attacks. XAMPP 1.8.1 is vulnerable; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-2594.title: Supportworks ITSM CVE-2013-2594 SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2594.body: Supportworks ITSM is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Supportworks ITSM 1.0.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-2596.title: Motorola Multiple Devices For Android Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2596.body: Multiple Motorola devices for Android are prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to gain root privileges, which may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2013-2618.title: Network Weathermap 'editor.php' HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2618.body: Network Weathermap is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Network Weathermap 0.97a is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-2619.title: Aspen CVE-2013-2619 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2619.body: Aspen is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Exploiting this issue can allow an attacker to gain access to arbitrary files. Information harvested may aid in launching further attacks. Aspen 0.8 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-2623.title: Telaen CVE-2013-2623 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2623.body: Telaen is prone to a cross-site-scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to Telaen 1.3.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2625.title: Multiple OTRS Products CVE-2013-2625 Access Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2625.body: Multiple OTRS products are prone to an access-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks. The following OTRS products are vulnerable: OTRS Help Desk versions prior to 3.2.4, 3.1.14, 3.0.19 OTRS ITSM versions prior to 3.2.3, 3.1.8, and 3.0.7 FAQ versions prior to 2.2.3, 2.1.4, and 2.0.8.

CVE-2013-2637.title: OTRS ITSM/FAQ Module CVE-2013-2637 Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-2637.body: OTRS is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. The following versions are vulnerable: OTRS ITSM versions prior to 3.2.4, 3.1.8, and 3.0.7 FAQ versions prior to 2.1.4 and 2.0.8.

CVE-2013-2652.title: WebCollab 'item' Parameter HTTP Response Splitting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2652.body: WebCollab is prone to an HTTP-response-splitting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Attackers can leverage this issue to influence or misrepresent how web content is served, cached, or interpreted. This could aid in various attacks that try to entice client users into a false sense of trust.

CVE-2013-2674.title: Brother MFC-9970CDW Printer CVE-2013-2674 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2674.body: Brother MFC-9970CDW Printer is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2013-2676.title: Brother MFC-9970CDW Printer CVE-2013-2676 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2676.body: Brother MFC-9970CDW Printer is prone to a remote information-disclosure vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attackers to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2013-2681.title: Cisco Linksys E4200 Router CVE-2013-2681 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2681.body: Cisco Linksys E4200 Router is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to the affected device. Cisco Linksys E4200 running firmware 1.0.05 Build 7 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-2683.title: Cisco Linksys E4200 Router CVE-2013-2683 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2683.body: Cisco Linksys E4200 router is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information. This may aid in further attacks. Cisco Linksys E4200 running firmware 1.0.05 Build 7 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-2684.title: Cisco Linksys E4200 Router CVE-2013-2684 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2684.body: Cisco Linksys E4200 router is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Cisco Linksys E4200 running firmware 1.0.05 Build 7 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-2690.title: SynConnect 'loginid' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2690.body: SynConnect is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. A successful exploit may allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. SynConnect 2.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-2691.title: jetAudio CVE-2013-2691 Remote Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2691.body: jetAudio is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied input. Attackers may be able to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. jetAudio 8.0.17 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-2698.title: WordPress Calendar Plugin CVE-2013-2698 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2698.body: The Calendar plugin for WordPress is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions in the context of the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Calendar 1.3.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-2710.title: WordPress Contextual Related Posts Plugin CVE-2013-2710 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2710.body: The Contextual Related Posts plugin for WordPress is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions in the context of the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Versions prior to Contextual Related Posts 1.8.7 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2730.title: Adobe Acrobat and Reader CVE-2013-2730 Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2730.body: Adobe Acrobat and Reader are prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks may cause a denial-of-service condition. Note: This issue was previously discussed in BID 59851 (Adobe Acrobat and Reader APSB13-15 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities), but has been moved to its own record for better documentation.

CVE-2013-2756.title: Apache CloudStack CVE-2013-2756 Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2756.body: Apache CloudStack is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attackers to bypass certain security restrictions, which may aid in further attacks. Apache CloudStack versions prior to 4.0.2 are affected.

CVE-2013-2757.title: Citrix CloudPlatform CVE-2013-2757 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2757.body: Citrix CloudPlatform is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attackers to bypass certain security restrictions, which may aid in further attacks. Citrix CloudPlatform versions 3.0.x through 3.0.6 are affected.

CVE-2013-2758.title: Apache CloudStack CVE-2013-2758 Hash Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2758.body: Apache CloudStack is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability because of generating predictable hash sequence. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information and gain unauthorized console access. Apache CloudStack versions prior to 4.0.2 are affected.

CVE-2013-2766.title: Splunk Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2766.body: Splunk is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary HTML and script code in an unsuspecting user's browser in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Splunk versions 4.3.0 through 4.3.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2776.title: Todd Miller Sudo CVE-2013-1776 Local Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2776.body: Todd Miller 'sudo' is prone to a local security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This issue affects 'sudo' 1.3.5 through 1.7.10p5 and sudo 1.8.0 through 1.8.6p6. Note: An attacker requires the 'tty_tickets' option to enable in versions prior to sudo 1.7.4..

CVE-2013-2776.title: Todd Miller Sudo CVE-2013-2776 Local Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2776.body: Todd Miller 'sudo' is prone to a local security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. sudo versions 1.3.5 through 1.7.10p5 and 1.8.0 through 1.8.6p6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-2777.title: Todd Miller Sudo CVE-2013-1776 Local Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2777.body: Todd Miller 'sudo' is prone to a local security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This issue affects 'sudo' 1.3.5 through 1.7.10p5 and sudo 1.8.0 through 1.8.6p6. Note: An attacker requires the 'tty_tickets' option to enable in versions prior to sudo 1.7.4..

CVE-2013-2877.title: Google Chrome CVE-2013-2877 Out of Bounds Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2877.body: Google Chrome is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. Versions prior to Chrome 28.0.1500.71 are vulnerable. Note: This issue was previously covered in BID 61041 (Google Chrome Prior to 28.0.1500.71 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities), but has been given its own record for better documentation.

CVE-2013-2889.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2013-2889 Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2889.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the kernel, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2013-2892.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2013-2892 Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2892.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the kernel, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2013-2893.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2013-2893 Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2893.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the kernel, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2013-2897.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2013-2897 Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2897.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the kernel, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2013-2929.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2013-2929 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2929.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers may exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges.

CVE-2013-2944.title: strongSwan OpenSSL Plugin CVE-2013-2944 Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2944.body: strongSwan is prone to a remote authentication-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass the authentication mechanism and perform unauthorized actions on the affected computer. This may aid in further attacks. strongSwan 4.3.5 through 5.0.3 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-2945.title: b2evolution CVE-2013-2945 SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-2945.body: b2evolution is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. b2evolution 4.1.6 is vulnerable; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-3004.title: IBM Tivoli Application Dependency Discovery Manager CVE-2013-3004 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3004.body: IBM Tivoli Application Dependency Discovery Manager is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. Remote attackers can use specially crafted requests with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to read arbitrary files in the context of the application. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2013-3034.title: IBM InfoSphere Information Server CVE-2013-3034 Unspecified HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3034.body: IBM InfoSphere Information Server is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may exploit the HTML-injection issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, control how the site is displayed, and launch other attacks.

CVE-2013-3040.title: IBM InfoSphere Information Server CVE-2013-3040 Username Enumeration Weakness
CVE-2013-3040.body: IBM InfoSphere Information Server is prone to a username-enumeration weakness. Attackers may exploit this weakness to discern valid usernames, which may aid them in brute-force password cracking or other attacks. IBM InfoSphere Information Server versions 8.1, 8.5, 8.7, and 9.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-3050.title: ZAPms 'pid' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3050.body: ZAPms is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. ZAPms 1.41 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-3097.title: Verizon FiOS Router CVE-2013-3097 Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3097.body: The Verizon FiOS router is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Verizon FIOS Router running firmware 40.19.36 is vulnerable; other version may also be affected.

CVE-2013-3213.title: vtiger CRM CVE-2013-3213 Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-3213.body: vtiger CRM is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. vtiger CRM 5.0.0 through versions 5.4.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-3215.title: vtiger CRM 'validateSession()' Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3215.body: vtiger CRM is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass the authentication mechanism and perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks. vtiger CRM 5.4.0 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-3249.title: DameWare Remote Support Remote Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3249.body: DameWare Remote Support is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied input. Attackers may be able to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. DameWare Remote Support 9.0.1.247 and 10.0.0.372 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-3256.title: WordPress SexyBookmarks Plugin Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3256.body: The SexyBookmarks plugin for WordPress is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions in the context of the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. SexyBookmarks 6.1.4.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-3257.title: WordPress Related Posts Plugin CVE-2013-3257 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3257.body: The Related Posts plugin for WordPress is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions in the context of the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Related Posts 2.7.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-3258.title: WordPress Digg Digg Plugin CVE-2013-3258 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3258.body: The Digg Digg plugin for WordPress is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions in the context of the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Digg Digg 5.3.4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-3259.title: Zoom Player CVE-2013-3259 Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3259.body: Zoom Player is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. Zoom Player 8.6.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-3260.title: Zoom Player CVE-2013-3260 Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3260.body: Zoom Player is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. Zoom Player 8.6.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-3262.title: Download Monitor 'p' Parameter Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3262.body: The Download Monitor plugin for WordPress is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Download Monitor versions prior to 3.3.6.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-3268.title: Novell iManager CVE-2013-3268 Unspecified Security Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3268.body: Novell iManager is prone to an unspecified security vulnerability. Little is known about this issue or its effects at this time. We will update this BID as more information emerges. Novell iManager versions prior to 2.7 SP6 Patch 1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-3285.title: EMC Networker Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3285.body: EMC Networker is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. A local attacker may exploit this issue to disclose sensitive information. This can lead to other attacks. Versions prior to EMC NetWorker 8.0.2.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-3320.title: NetApp OnCommand System Manager Multiple Cross Site Scripting and HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-3320.body: NetApp OnCommand System Manager is prone to multiple cross-site scripting and HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. NetApp OnCommand System Manager 2.1, 2.0.2 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-3323.title: Multiple IBM Products Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-3323.body: Multiple IBM products are prone to the multiple security vulnerabilities including: 1. Multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities 2. Multiple information-disclosure vulnerabilities 3. Multiple SQL-injection issues 4. Multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities 5. Multiple privilege-escalation issues 6. A file-include vulnerability An attacker can exploit these issues to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the application, access or modify data, execute arbitrary files within the context of the web server, exploit vulnerabilities in the underlying database, obtain potentially sensitive information, gain escalated privileges, bypass security restrictions, and perform unauthorized actions; other attacks may also be possible. The following products are affected: Maximo Asset Management 7.5, 7.1, and 6.2 Maximo Asset Management Essentials 7.5, 7.1, and 6.2 SmartCloud Control Desk 7.5 Tivoli Asset Management for IT 7.2, 7.1, and 6.2 Tivoli Service Request Manager 7.2 and 7.1 Maximo Service Desk 6.2 Change and Configuration Management Database 7.2 and 7.1

CVE-2013-3429.title: Cisco Video Surveillance Manager CVE-2013-3429 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3429.body: Cisco Video Surveillance Manager is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. Exploiting this issue can allow an attacker to gain access to arbitrary files. Information harvested may aid in launching further attacks. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCsv37163. Versions prior to Cisco Video Surveillance Manager 7.0.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-3430.title: Cisco Video Surveillance Manager CVE-2013-3430 Remote Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3430.body: Cisco Video Surveillance Manager is prone to a remote authentication-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass the authentication mechanism and gain administrative controls of the vulnerable device. This may lead to further attacks. This issue is tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCsv37288. Versions prior to Cisco Video Surveillance Manager 7.0.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-3431.title: Cisco Video Surveillance Manager CVE-2013-3431 Remote Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3431.body: Cisco Video Surveillance Manager is prone to a remote authentication-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass the authentication mechanism and gain administrative controls of the vulnerable device. This may lead to further attacks. This issue is tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCsv40169. Versions prior to Cisco Video Surveillance Manager 7.0.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-3436.title: Cisco IOS GET VPN Encryption Policy CVE-2013-3436 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3436.body: Cisco IOS is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions on the affected device. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCui07698.

CVE-2013-3439.title: Cisco Unified Operations Manager CVE-2013-3439 Unspecified HTTP Header Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3439.body: Cisco Unified Operations Manager is prone to a vulnerability which allows attackers to inject arbitrary HTTP headers because it fails to sufficiently sanitize input. By inserting arbitrary headers into an HTTP response, attackers may be able to launch various attacks, including cross-site request forgery, cross-site scripting, and HTTP-request smuggling. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCud80182.

CVE-2013-3440.title: Cisco Unified Operations Manager CVE-2013-3440 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3440.body: Cisco Unified Operations Manager is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCud80186.

CVE-2013-3441.title: Cisco Aironet 3600 Series Access Point CVE-2013-3441 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3441.body: Cisco Aironet 3600 Series Access Point is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to cause denial-of-service conditions. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCuh71210.

CVE-2013-3443.title: Cisco Wide Area Application Services CVE-2013-3443 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3443.body: Cisco Wide Area Application Services is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. This issue is being tracked by Cisco bug ID CSCuh26626.

CVE-2013-3444.title: Multiple Cisco Content Network and Video Delivery Products Command Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3444.body: Multiple Cisco Content Network and Video Delivery products are prone to a remote command-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an unprivileged attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the affected system and completely compromise the affected devices. This issue is being tracked by Cisco bug IDs CSCug40609, CSCug48855, CSCug48921, CSCug48872, CSCuh21103, CSCuh21020, and CSCug56790.

CVE-2013-3445.title: Cisco Identity Services Engine Software CVE-2013-3445 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3445.body: Cisco Identity Services Engine Software is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause the device to consume excessive CPU resources, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCug94572.

CVE-2013-3463.title: Cisco Adaptive Security Appliance CVE-2013-3463 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3463.body: Cisco Adaptive Security Appliance is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. A remote attacker may exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug IDs CSCuh13899.

CVE-2013-3467.body: Cisco Unified Computing System is prone to multiple local denial-of-service vulnerabilities. CVE-2013-3470.title: Cisco IOS XR Software CVE-2013-3470 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3470.body: Cisco IOS XR Software is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause the RIP process to crash on an affected device, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug IDs CSCue46731.

CVE-2013-3474.title: Cisco Wireless LAN Controller CVE-2013-3474 Multiple Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-3474.body: Cisco Wireless LAN Controller is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities. A remote attacker may exploit these issues to cause denial-of-service conditions. These issues are being tracked by Cisco Bug IDs CSCuh14313, CSCuh14159, CSCuh14368, and CSCuh14436.

CVE-2013-3475.body: IBM DB2 and DB2 Connect are prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Exploiting this issue allows local attackers to gain DB2 instance with owner level privileges. The following products are affected: IBM DB2 Express Edition IBM DB2 Workgroup Server Edition IBM DB2 Enterprise Server Edition IBM DB2 Advanced Enterprise Server Edition IBM DB2 Connect Application Server Edition IBM DB2 Connect Enterprise Edition IBM DB2 Connect Unlimited Edition for System i IBM DB2 Connect Unlimited Edition for System z

CVE-2013-3609.title: Supermicro IPMI Web Interface Unspecified Remote Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3609.body: Supermicro IPMI Web Interface is prone to a remote privilege-escalation vulnerability because it fails to adequately sanitize user-supplied input data. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges and perform unauthorized actions.

CVE-2013-3617.title: Openbravo ERP  CVE-2013-3617 XML External Entity Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3617.body: Openbravo ERP is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information; this may lead to further attacks. Openbravo ERP 2.5 and 3.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-3636.title: ProjectPier CVE-2013-3636 Remote Information Disclosure Weakness
CVE-2013-3636.body: ProjectPier is prone to a remote information-disclosure weakness. Attackers can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. ProjectPier 0.8.8 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected. NOTE: The issue (described by CVE-2013-3637) has been moved to BID 61165 (ProjectPier CVE-2013-3637 Remote Information Disclosure Weakness) to better document it.

CVE-2013-3638.title: Boonex Dolphin 'categories.php' SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3638.body: Boonex Dolphin is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. A successful exploit may allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Boonex Dolphin 7.1.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-3664.title: Trimble Sketchup CVE-2013-3664 Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3664.body: Trimble SketchUp is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied input before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. Successful exploits allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. The following versions are vulnerable. Trimble SketchUp 8 - Maintenance 5 Trimble SketchUp 8 - Maintenance 4 Trimble SketchUp 8 - Maintenance 3 Trimble SketchUp 8 - Maintenance 2 Trimble SketchUp 8 - Maintenance 1 Trimble SketchUp 8 Trimble SketchUp 7.1 - Maintenance 2 Trimble SketchUp 7.1 - Maintenance 1 Trimble SketchUp 7.1 Trimble SketchUp 7 - Maintenance 1 Trimble SketchUp Pro 6 - Maintenance 6 Note 1: The issue described by CVE-2013-7388 has been moved to BID 68451 (paintlib CVE-2013-7388 Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability) for better documentation. Note 2: This issue was previously titled 'Trimble Sketchup CVE-2013-3664 Multiple Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities'. The title and technical details have been changed to better reflect the underlying component affected.

CVE-2013-3823.title: Oracle Agile PLM Framework CVE-2013-3823 Remote Security Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3823.body: Oracle Agile PLM Framework is prone to a remote security vulnerability. The vulnerability can be exploited over the 'HTTP' protocol. The 'Security' sub component is affected. This vulnerability affects the following supported versions: 9.3.1

CVE-2013-3825.title: Oracle Agile Product Collaboration CVE-2013-3825 Remote Security Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3825.body: Oracle Agile Product Collaboration is prone to a remote security vulnerability. The vulnerability can be exploited over the 'HTTP' protocol. The 'Folders &amp; Files Attachment' sub component is affected. This vulnerability affects the following supported versions: 9.3.1

CVE-2013-3893.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer CVE-2013-3893 Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3893.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions. Internet Explorer versions 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, and 11 are affected.

CVE-2013-3928.title: Chasys Draw IES CVE-2013-3928 Multiple Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-3928.body: Chasys Draw IES is prone to multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Attackers may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions. Chasys Draw 4.10.01 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-3931.title: Joomla! Jomres Component 'property_name' Parameter HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3931.body: The Jomres component is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Jomres 7.3.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-3932.title: Joomla! Jomres Component 'id' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3932.body: The Jomres Component for Joomla! is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. A successful exploit may allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Jomres 7.3.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-3934.title: Kingsoft Writer CVE-2013-3934 Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3934.body: Kingsoft Writer is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. The following versions are vulnerable: Kingsoft Writer 2012 8.1.0.3030 Kingsoft Kingsoft Office 2012 8.1.0.3385

CVE-2013-3944.title: IrfanView Formats PlugIn 'MrSID.dll' Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3944.body: The Formats PlugIn for IrfanView is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the software fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied input before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. Successful exploits allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts likely result in denial-of-service conditions. Formats PlugIn 4.36 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-3961.title: Simple PHP Agenda 'edit_event.php' SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3961.body: Simple PHP Agenda is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Simple PHP Agenda 2.2.8 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-3979.title: IBM Cognos Command Center Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3979.body: IBM Cognos Command Center is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize unspecified user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site and steal cookie-based authentication credentials. IBM Cognos Command Center 10.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-3992.title: RETIRED: IBM InfoSphere BigInsights Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-3992.body: IBM InfoSphere BigInsights is prone to a spoofing vulnerability, a cross-site scripting vulnerability, and a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. An attacker may exploit these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, perform unauthorized actions, and disclose or modify sensitive information, conduct spoofing attacks, and gain access to sensitive information. Other attacks may also be possible. This BID is being retired. The following individual records exist to better document the issues: 61842 IBM InfoSphere BigInsights CVE-2013-3992 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability 61845 IBM InfoSphere BigInsights CVE-2013-3995 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability 61846 IBM InfoSphere BigInsights CVE-2013-3996 Unspecified Spoofing Vulnerability

CVE-2013-3993.title: IBM InfoSphere BigInsights CVE-2013-3993 Unauthorized Access Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3993.body: IBM InfoSphere BigInsights is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass files and directories restrictions or gain unauthorized access to the data or code, aiding in further attacks.

CVE-2013-3995.title: RETIRED: IBM InfoSphere BigInsights Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-3995.body: IBM InfoSphere BigInsights is prone to a spoofing vulnerability, a cross-site scripting vulnerability, and a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. An attacker may exploit these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, perform unauthorized actions, and disclose or modify sensitive information, conduct spoofing attacks, and gain access to sensitive information. Other attacks may also be possible. This BID is being retired. The following individual records exist to better document the issues: 61842 IBM InfoSphere BigInsights CVE-2013-3992 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability 61845 IBM InfoSphere BigInsights CVE-2013-3995 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability 61846 IBM InfoSphere BigInsights CVE-2013-3996 Unspecified Spoofing Vulnerability

CVE-2013-3996.title: RETIRED: IBM InfoSphere BigInsights Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-3996.body: IBM InfoSphere BigInsights is prone to a spoofing vulnerability, a cross-site scripting vulnerability, and a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. An attacker may exploit these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, perform unauthorized actions, and disclose or modify sensitive information, conduct spoofing attacks, and gain access to sensitive information. Other attacks may also be possible. This BID is being retired. The following individual records exist to better document the issues: 61842 IBM InfoSphere BigInsights CVE-2013-3992 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability 61845 IBM InfoSphere BigInsights CVE-2013-3995 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability 61846 IBM InfoSphere BigInsights CVE-2013-3996 Unspecified Spoofing Vulnerability

CVE-2013-3997.title: IBM InfoSphere BigInsights CVE-2013-3997 Open Redirection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-3997.body: IBM InfoSphere BigInsights is prone to an open-redirection vulnerability because it fails to properly validate user-supplied input. An attacker can leverage this issue by constructing a crafted URI and enticing a user to follow it. When an unsuspecting victim follows the link, they may be redirected to an attacker-controlled site; this may aid in phishing attacks. Other attacks are possible. IBM InfoSphere BigInsights 1.1 through 2.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4004.title: IBM WebSphere Application Server CVE-2013-4004 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4004.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. IBM WebSphere Application Server versions 8 and 8.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4039.title: IBM WebSphere Extended Deployment Compute Grid CVE-2013-4039 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4039.body: IBM WebSphere Extended Deployment Compute Grid is prone to an unspecified information-disclosure vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attackers to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. Limited information is available regarding this issue; this BID will be updated as more information becomes available. Versions prior to IBM WebSphere Extended Deployment Compute Grid 8.0.0.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4057.title: IBM InfoSphere Information Server CVE-2013-4057 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4057.body: IBM InfoSphere Information Server is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability because it fails to properly validate HTTP requests. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. IBM InfoSphere Information Server 8.0, 8.1, 8.5, 8.7, and 9.1 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-4058.title: IBM InfoSphere Information Server CVE-2013-4058 Unspecified SQL Injection Vulnerabilitiy
CVE-2013-4058.body: IBM InfoSphere Information Server is prone to an unspecified SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue by manipulating the SQL query logic to carry out unauthorized actions on the underlying database. IBM InfoSphere Information Server 8.0, 8.1, 8.5, 8.7, and 9.1 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-4059.title: IBM InfoSphere Information Server CVE-2013-4059 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4059.body: IBM InfoSphere Information Server is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary HTML and script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2013-4066.title: IBM InfoSphere Information Server Web Console Interface Clickjacking Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4066.body: IBM InfoSphere Information Server is prone to a clickjacking vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow an authenticated attacker to compromise the affected application or obtain sensitive information. Other attacks are also possible. InfoSphere Information Server 8.0.1, 8.1, 8.5, 8.7, and 9.1 are vulnerable. other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-4067.title: IBM InfoSphere Information Server CVE-2013-4067 Security Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4067.body: IBM InfoSphere Information Server is prone to a security vulnerability that allows attackers to disclose sensitive information and manipulate session and cookies. An attacker can exploit this issue to steal or manipulate session and cookies, or disclose sensitive information such as username or password. IBM InfoSphere Information Server versions 8.0, 8.1, 8.5, 8.7, and 9.1 are affected.

CVE-2013-4080.title: Wireshark CVE-2013-4080 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4080.body: Wireshark is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. Wireshark versions 1.8.0 through 1.8.7 are vulnerable. Note: This issue was previously discussed in BID 60448 (Wireshark Multiple Buffer Overflow and Denial of Service), but has been moved to its own record for better documentation.

CVE-2013-4081.title: Wireshark CVE-2013-4081 Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4081.body: Wireshark is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions. Wireshark versions 1.6.0 through 1.6.15 and 1.8.0 through 1.8.7 are vulnerable. Note: This issue was previously discussed in BID 60448 (Wireshark Multiple Buffer Overflow and Denial of Service), but has been moved to its own record for better documentation.

CVE-2013-4115.title: Squid 'idnsALookup()' Function Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4115.body: Squid is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. Squid versions 3.2 through 3.2.11 and 3.3 through 3.3.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4117.title: WordPress Category Grid View Gallery Plugin 'ID' Parameter Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4117.body: The Category Grid View Gallery plugin for WordPress is prone to a cross-site-scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2013-4118.title: FreeRDP Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4118.body: FreeRDP is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. Remote attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application or cause denial-of-service conditions. FreeRDP 1.1.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-4119.title: FreeRDP Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4119.body: FreeRDP is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. Remote attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application or cause denial-of-service conditions. FreeRDP 1.1.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-4125.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2013-4125 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4125.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause a kernel crash, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2013-4129.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2013-4129 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4129.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause a kernel crash, denying service to legitimate users. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible with kernel privileges; this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2013-4131.title: Apache Subversion CVE-2013-4131 Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4131.body: Apache Subversion is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. Apache Subversion versions prior to 1.7.11 and 1.8.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4140.title: Drupal TinyBox Module Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4140.body: The TinyBox module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. TinyBox 7.x-2.0 and 7.x-2.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4152.title: Spring Framework CVE-2013-4152 Multiple XML External Entity Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4152.body: Spring Framework is prone to multiple XML External Entity injection vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to obtain potentially sensitive information. This may lead to further attacks. The following versions are vulnerable: Spring OXM 3.0.0 through 3.2.3 and 4.0.0.M1 Spring MVC 3.0.0 through 3.2.3, 4.0.0.M1 and 4.0.0.M2

CVE-2013-4158.title: SmokePing 'displaymode' Parameter CVE-2013-4158 Incomplete Fix Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4158.body: SmokePing is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Note: This issue is the result of an incomplete fix for the issue described in BID 51584 (SmokePing 'displaymode' Parameter Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability).

CVE-2013-4162.title: Linux Kernel 'skbuff.c' Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4162.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause the kernel to crash, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2013-4163.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2013-4163 Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4163.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause the kernel to crash, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2013-4164.title: Ruby Floating Point Parsing Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4164.body: Ruby is prone to a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application using the affected function. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the application. Following versions are vulnerable: Ruby 1.8 Ruby 1.9 prior to 1.9.3-p484 Ruby 2.0 prior to 2.0.0-p353 Ruby 2.1 prior to 2.1.0 preview2

CVE-2013-4174.title: Drupal Scald Module Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4174.body: The Scald module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. The following versions are vulnerable: Scald 6.x-1.x prior to 6.x-1.0-beta3 Scald 7.x-1.x prior to 7.x-1.1

CVE-2013-4177.title: Drupal Google Authenticator Login Module Access Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4177.body: The Google Authenticator login module for Drupal is prone to an access-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to other user's account. Google Authenticator login 6.x-1.x versions prior to 6.x-1.2 and 7.x-1.x versions prior to 7.x-1.4 are vulnerable. Note: The issue described by CVE-2013-4178 has been moved to BID 61568 (Drupal Google Authenticator Login CVE-2013-4178 Module One Time Password Replay Weakness) for better documentation.

CVE-2013-4178.title: Drupal Google Authenticator Login Module Access Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4178.body: The Google Authenticator login module for Drupal is prone to an access-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and gain unauthorized access to other user's account. Google Authenticator login 6.x-1.x versions prior to 6.x-1.2 and 7.x-1.x versions prior to 7.x-1.4 are vulnerable. Note: The issue described by CVE-2013-4178 has been moved to BID 61568 (Drupal Google Authenticator Login CVE-2013-4178 Module One Time Password Replay Weakness) for better documentation.

CVE-2013-4211.title: OpenX 'flowplayer-3.1.1.min.js' Backdoor Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4211.body: OpenX is prone to a backdoor vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Successful attacks will compromise the affected application. OpenX 2.8.10 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-4223.title: Gentoo Linux nullmailer Package '/etc/nullmailer/remotes' Insecure File Permissions Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4223.body: Gentoo Linux nullmailer package is prone to an insecure file-permission vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue by gaining access to a world-readable file and extracting sensitive information from it. Such information could aid in other attacks. nullmailer versions prior to 1.11-r2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4229.title: Drupal Monster Menus Module Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4229.body: The Monster Menus module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Monster Menus 7.x-1.x versions prior to 7.x-1.13 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4230.title: Drupal Monster Menus Module Access Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4230.body: The Monster Menus module for Drupal is prone to an access-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. Monster Menus 6.x-6.x versions prior to 6.x-6.61 and 7.x-1.x versions prior to 7.x-1.13 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4231.title: LibTIFF CVE-2013-4231 Multiple Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4231.body: LibTIFF is prone to multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected library. Failed exploits can cause a denial-of-service condition. LibTIFF 4.0.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-4234.title: libmodplug CVE-2013-4234 Multiple Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4234.body: libmodplug is prone to multiple heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to properly bounds check user-supplied input before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of the user running the affected application. Failed attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition. libmodplug 0.8.8.4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-4237.title: GNU glibc CVE-2013-4237 Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4237.body: GNU glibc is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may crash the application, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2013-4242.title: libgcrypt RSA Secret Keys Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4242.body: libgcrypt is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. Versions prior to libgcrypt 1.5.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4243.title: LibTIFF CVE-2013-4243 Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4243.body: The LibTIFF is prone to a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application using the affected library. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the application. LibTIFF 4.0.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-4248.title: PHP SSL Certificate Validation CVE-2013-4248 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4248.body: PHP is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because the application fails to properly validate SSL certificates from the server. An attacker can exploit this issue to perform man-in-the-middle attacks or impersonate trusted servers, which will aid in further attacks.

CVE-2013-4251.title: SciPy 'scipy.weave' Insecure Temporary Directory Creation Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4251.body: SciPy is prone to a vulnerability because it creates temporary directory in an insecure manner. A local attacker may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running 'scipy.weave' component. Versions prior to SciPy 0.12.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4256.title: Network Audio System CVE-2013-4256 Multiple Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4256.body: Network Audio System is prone to multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. An attacker could exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. Network Audio System 1.9.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-4274.title: Drupal Password Policy Module Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4274.body: The Password Policy module for Drupal is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. The following versions are vulnerable: Password Policy 6.x-1.x versions prior to 6.x-1.5 Password policy 7.x-1.x versions prior to 7.x-1.4

CVE-2013-4275.title: Drupal Zen Theme DRUPAL-SA-CONTRIB-2013-070 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4275.body: The Zen theme for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. The following versions are vulnerable: Zen 7.x-3.x versions prior to 7.x-3.2Zen 7.x-5.x versions prior to 7.x-5.4

CVE-2013-4276.title: Little CMS Multiple Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4276.body: Little CMS is prone to multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Attackers may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions. Little CMS 1.19 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-4277.title: Apache Subversion CVE-2013-4277 Insecure Temporary File Creation Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4277.body: Apache Subversion is prone to an insecure temporary-file-creation vulnerability. Local attackers may be able to perform symbolic-link attacks to overwrite arbitrary files in the context of the affected application. Other attacks may also be possible.

CVE-2013-4279.title: imapsync CVE-2013-4279 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4279.body: imapsync is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability Successful exploits will allow attackers to obtain sensitive information such as version of imapsync, the operating system and perl, that may lead to further attacks. imapsync 1.580 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4282.title: SPICE 'reds_handle_ticket()' Function Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4282.body: SPICE is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability due to a buffer-overflow condition. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the application and possibly the underlying computer, denying service to legitimate users. Given the nature of this issue, attackers may also be able to execute arbitrary code, but this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2013-4286.title: Apache Tomcat CVE-2013-4286 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4286.body: Apache Tomcat is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. A remote attacker may leverage this issue to poison web caches, evade IDS signatures, and launch cross-site scripting, HTML-injection, and session-hijacking attacks. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2013-4303.title: Mediawiki CVE-2013-4303 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4303.body: Mediawiki is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to Mediawiki 1.19.8, 1.20.7 and 1.21.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4306.title: MediaWiki CheckUser Extension CVE-2013-4306 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4306.body: The CheckUser Extension for MediaWiki is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions in the context of the affected application. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2013-4307.title: Mediawiki Wikibase Extension CVE-2013-4307 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4307.body: The Wikibase extension for Mediawiki is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2013-4308.title: Mediawiki LiquidThreads Extension CVE-2013-4308 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4308.body: The LiquidThreads extension for Mediawiki is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.
