CVE-2013-4312.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2013-4312 Multiple Local Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4312.body: Linux Kernel is prone to multiple local denial-of-service vulnerabilities. Successful exploitation of these issues will cause excessive memory consumption, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2013-4322.title: Apache Tomcat CVE-2013-4322 Incomplete Fix Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4322.body: Apache Tomcat is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers may leverage this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. The following versions are vulnerable: Tomcat 8.0.0-RC1 through 8.0.0-RC5 Tomcat 7.0.0 through 7.0.47 Tomcat 6.0.0 through 6.0.37 Note: This issue exists due to an incomplete fix for CVE-2012-3544 (identified in BID 59797 - Apache Tomcat CVE-2012-3544 Denial of Service Vulnerability).

CVE-2013-4332.title: GNU glibc Multiple Integer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4332.body: GNU glibc is prone to multiple remote integer-overflow vulnerabilities. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of a user running an application that uses the affected library. Failed exploit attempts may crash the application, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2013-4345.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2013-4345 Off-By-One Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4345.body: The Linux kernel is prone to an off-by-one buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of a user running the affected application.

CVE-2013-4346.title: python-oauth2 Signed URL Nonce Verification Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4346.body: python-oauth2 is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to alter URLs and perform malicious actions through replay attacks; other attacks may also be possible.

CVE-2013-4347.title: python-oauth2 CVE-2013-4347 Multiple Predictable Random Number Generator Weaknesses
CVE-2013-4347.body: python-oauth2 is prone to multiple predictable random number generator (PRNG) weaknesses. Attackers can leverage these weaknesses to aid in brute-force attacks. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2013-4356.title: Xen CVE-2013-4356 Local Memory Access Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4356.body: Xen is prone to a local memory-access vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to disclose sensitive information or manipulate certain data of memory. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2013-4362.title: DavFS2 'system()' Function Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4362.body: DavFS2 is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges on affected computers. Other attacks are also possible. DavFS2 1.4.6 and 1.4.7 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4365.title: Apache 'mod_fcgid' Module CVE-2013-4365 Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4365.body: Apache 'mod_fcgid' Module is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. Attackers may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions. Apache 'mod_fcgid' Module prior to 2.3.9 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4372.title: JBoss Fuse Management Console CVE-2013-4372 Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4372.body: JBoss Fuse Management Console is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied inputs. Attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible. JBoss Fuse 6.0.0 is vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4383.title: Drupal jQuery Countdown Module HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4383.body: The jQuery Countdown module for Drupal is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied text. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. jQuery Countdown 7.x-1.0 is vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4384.title: Drupal Google Site Search Module Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4384.body: Google Site Search module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. The following versions are affected: Drupal Google Site Search versions 6.x-1.x through 6.x-1.3 Drupal Google Site Search versions 7.x-1.x through 7.x-1.9

CVE-2013-4385.title: CHICKEN 'read-string!' Procedure Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4385.body: CHICKEN is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. Versions prior to CHICKEN 4.8.0.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4388.title: VLC Media Player CVE-2013-4388 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4388.body: VLC media player is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. Attackers may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions. VLC media player 2.0.8 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-4396.title: X.Org X Server 'dixfonts.c' Use-After-Free Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4396.body: X.Org X Server is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with root privileges. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2013-4397.title: libtar 'th_read()' Function Multiple Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4397.body: libtar is prone to multiple heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application using the affected library. Failed attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition. libtar versions 1.2.19 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4408.title: Samba 'dcerpc_read_ncacn_packet_done()' Function Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4408.body: Samba is prone to a remote heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in a denial of service. The following versions are vulnerable: Samba 3.x prior to 3.6.22 Samba 4.0.x prior to 4.0.13 Samba 4.1.x prior to 4.1.3

CVE-2013-4409.title: Djblets 'eval()' Routine Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4409.body: Djblets is prone to a remote code execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application.

CVE-2013-4412.title: SLiM NULL Pointer Dereference Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4412.body: SLiM is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to trigger a NULL-pointer dereference and cause an application crash, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2013-4413.title: RubyGems Wicked Arbitrary File Access Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4413.body: Wicked is prone to an arbitrary file-access vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to read arbitrary files in the context of the web server process, which may aid in further attacks. Versions prior to Wicked 1.0.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4416.title: Xen OXenstored CVE-2013-4416 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4416.body: Xen is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause affected domain's connection to be shutdown, causing a denial of service condition.

CVE-2013-4422.title: Qt PostgreSQL Driver SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4422.body: Qt is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using in an SQL query. A successful exploit may allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2013-4428.title: OpenStack Glance 'download_image' Policy Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4428.body: Glance is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2013-4433.title: XHProf 'run' Parameter Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4433.body: XHProf is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit this issue to steal cookie-based authentication information, execute arbitrary client-side scripts in the context of the browser, and obtain sensitive information. Other attacks are also possible. XHProf versions 0.9.3 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4444.title: Apache Tomcat CVE-2013-4444 Arbitrary File Upload Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4444.body: Apache Tomcat is prone to a vulnerability that lets attackers upload arbitrary files. An attacker may leverage this issue to upload arbitrary files to the affected computer; this can result in arbitrary code execution within the context of the web server process. Tomcat versions 7.0.0 through 7.0.39 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4449.title: OpenLDAP 'rwm_conn_destroy' Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4449.body: OpenLDAP is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the affected application denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2013-4450.title: Node.js CVE-2013-4450 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4450.body: Node.js is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2013-4451.title: Gitolite Multiple Insecure File Permissions Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4451.body: Gitolite is prone to multiple insecure file-permission vulnerabilities. A local attacker can exploit these issues to overwrite certain files with arbitrary data. This may lead to privilege escalation; other attacks may also be possible.

CVE-2013-4452.title: JBoss Operations Network CVE-2013-4452 Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4452.body: JBoss Operations Network is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information regarding the installation, including various authentication credentials. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2013-4454.title: WordPress Portable phpMyAdmin Plugin Multiple Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4454.body: The Portable phpMyAdmin plugin for WordPress is prone to multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities. Successfully exploiting these issues may allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions and obtain sensitive information such as WordPress database username and password. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2013-4467.title: VICIDIAL 'manager_send.php' CVE-2013-4467 SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4467.body: VICIDIAL is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. A successful exploit will allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Note: This issue was previously covered in BID 63288 (VICIDIAL Multiple SQL Injection and Command Injection Vulnerabilities), but has been moved to its own record for better documentation. VICIDIAL 2.7RC1, 2.7 and 2.8-403a are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-4470.title: Linux Kernel CVE-2013-4470 Multiple Local Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4470.body: The Linux kernel is prone to multiple local memory-corruption vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code with kernel-level privileges. Failed exploit attempts may cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2013-4473.title: Poppler 'utils/pdfseparate.cc' File Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4473.body: Poppler is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data. Successfully exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploits may result in denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to Poppler 0.24.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4474.title: Poppler '/utils/pdfseparate.cc' Local Format String Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4474.body: Poppler is prone to a local format-string vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in a denial-of-service condition. Versions prior to Poppler 0.24.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4475.title: Samba ACL Check Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4475.body: Samba is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass access control lists (ACLs) and gain access to restricted resources. This may aid in further attacks. Versions prior to Samba 3.6.20, 4.0.11, and 4.1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4488.title: libgadu SSL Certificate Validation CVE-2013-4488 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4488.body: libgadu is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to perform man-in-the-middle attacks or impersonate trusted servers, which will aid in further attacks.

CVE-2013-4491.title: RubyGems i18n Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4491.body: RubyGems i18n is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to RubyGems i18n 0.6.6, and 0.5.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4492.title: RubyGems i18n Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4492.body: RubyGems i18n is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to RubyGems i18n 0.6.6, and 0.5.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4512.title: Linux Kernel 'exitcode_proc_write()' Function Local Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4512.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the kernel, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2013-4513.title: Linux Kernel 'oz_cdev_write()' Function Local Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4513.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the kernel, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2013-4514.title: Linux Kernel 'drivers/staging/wlags49_h2/wl_priv.c' Local Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4514.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the kernel, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2013-4517.title: Apache Santuario XML Security For JAVA XML Signature Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4517.body: Apache Santuario XML Security for JAVA is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. Apache Santuario XML Security for JAVA 1.4.x and 1.5.x versions prior to 1.5.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4519.title: Review Board CVE-2013-4519 Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4519.body: Review Board is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Review Board 1.7.16, 1.6.20 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4551.title: Xen CVE-2013-4551 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4551.body: Xen is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker with access to a guest operating system can exploit this issue to crash the host operating system, effectively denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2013-4588.title: Linux Kernel IP Virtual Server Multiple Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4588.body: Linux Kernel is prone to multiple stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the kernel, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2013-4590.title: Apache Tomcat CVE-2013-4590 XML External Entity Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4590.body: Apache Tomcat is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information; this may lead to further attacks. The following versions are vulnerable: Apache Tomcat 8.0.0-RC1 through 8.0.0-RC5 Apache Tomcat 7.0.0 through 7.0.47 Apache Tomcat 6.0.0 through 6.0.37

CVE-2013-4591.title: Linux Kernel '__nfs4_get_acl_uncached()' Function Local Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4591.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the kernel, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2013-4596.title: Drupal Node Access Keys Module Access Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4596.body: The Node Access Keys module for Drupal is prone to an access-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. Node Access Keys 7.x-1.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-4598.title: Drupal Groups, Communities and Co (GCC) Module Access Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4598.body: The Groups, Communities and Co (GCC) module for Drupal is prone to an access-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. Groups, Communities and Co (GCC) 7.x-1.x versions prior to 7.x-1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4599.title: Drupal Misery Module Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4599.body: The Misery module for Drupal is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can leverage this issue to crash the affected application and affect file operations, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. Misery versions 7.x-2.x prior to 7.x-2.3 and 6.x-2.x prior to 6.x-2.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4621.title: Magnolia CMS CVE-2013-4621 Multiple Access Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4621.body: Magnolia CMS is prone to multiple access-bypass vulnerabilities. Successfully exploiting these issues may allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. Versions prior to Magnolia CMS 4.5.9 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4623.title: PolarSSL Certificate Message Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4623.body: PolarSSL is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. PolarSSL versions prior to 1.1.7 and 1.2.8 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4625.title: WordPress Duplicator Plugin CVE-2013-4625 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4625.body: The Duplicator plugin for WordPress is prone to a cross-site-scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Duplicator 0.4.4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-4634.title: TYPO3 'jQuery autocomplete for indexed_search' Extension Unspecified SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4634.body: The jQuery autocomplete for indexed_search Extension for TYPO3 is prone to an unspecified SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. jQuery autocomplete for indexed_search 0.0.8 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4653.title: Multiple Alcatel-Lucent OmniTouch Products CVE-2013-4653 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4653.body: Multiple Alcatel-Lucent OmniTouch products are prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker could leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This could allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. The following products are vulnerable: Omnitouch 8660 My Teamwork versions prior to 6.7 Omnitouch 8670 Automated Message Delivery System versions prior to 6.7 Omnitouch 8460 Advanced Communication Server versions prior to 9.1 OmniTouch 8400 Instant Communications Suite versions prior to 6.7.3

CVE-2013-4668.title: File Roller CVE-2013-4668 Multiple Directory Traversal Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4668.body: File Roller is prone to multiple directory-traversal vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit these vulnerabilities to overwrite arbitrary files in the context of the user running the vulnerable application. Following versions are vulnerable: File Roller 3.6.0 through 3.6.3 File Roller 3.8.0 through 3.8.2 File Roller 3.9.1 and 3.9.2

CVE-2013-4673.title: Symantec Web Gateway CVE-2013-4673 Remote Command Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4673.body: Symantec Web Gateway is prone to a vulnerability that can allow an attacker to execute arbitrary commands. Successful exploits will result in the execution of arbitrary commands in the context of the affected appliance. Versions prior to Symantec Web Gateway 5.1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4674.title: Symantec Encryption Management Server Web Email Protection Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4674.body: Encryption Management Server is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.

CVE-2013-4690.title: Multiple Juniper Gateway Products Ethernet Packet Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4690.body: Multiple Juniper Gateway Products are prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can leverage this issue to gain access to sensitive information. Information obtained will aid in further attacks. Juniper Gateway Products SRX1400, SRX3400, and SRX3600 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4692.title: Xorbin Analog Flash Clock 'widgetUrl' Parameter Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4692.body: The Xorbin Analog Flash Clock plugin is prone to a cross-site-scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Xorbin Analog Flash Clock 1.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-4694.title: Winamp CVE-2013-4694 Multiple Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4694.body: Winamp is prone to multiple stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because the application fails to properly bound-check user-supplied data before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. Successful exploits allow attackers to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. Winamp 5.63 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-4720.title: TYPO3 WEC Discussion Forum Unspecified SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4720.body: The WEC Discussion Forum for TYPO3 is prone to an unspecified SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Versions prior to WEC Discussion Forum 2.1.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4742.title: SurgeFTP CVE-2013-4742 Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4742.body: SurgeFTP is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. SurgeFTP 23c8 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-4747.title: TYPO3 Accessible browse results for indexed Extension Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4747.body: The Accessible browse results for indexed search extension for TYPO3 is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Accessible browse results for indexed search 1.2.1 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4751.title: Symfony CVE-2013-4751 Multiple Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4751.body: Symfony is prone to multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities. An attacker may exploit these issues to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. Versions prior to Symfony 2.0.24, 2.1.12, 2.2.5, and 2.3.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4752.body: Symfony is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability that allows attackers to spoof request headers. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions by spoofing request headers, allowing the attacker to perform malicious activities. Other attacks may also be possible. Versions prior to Symfony 2.0.24, 2.1.12, 2.2.5, and 2.3.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4759.title: Magnolia CMS CVE-2013-4759 Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-4759.body: Magnolia CMS is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Magnolia CMS versions 4.5.7, 4.5.8, 4.5.9, 5.0 and 5.0.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4788.body: The 'glibc' and 'eglibc' libraries are prone to buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. glibc 2.4 through 2.17 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4789.title: Cotonti 'c' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-4789.body: Cotonti is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. CVE-2013-4795.body: Review Board is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. CVE-2013-4860.body: Radio Thermostat CT80 and CT50 are prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions.Radio Thermostat CT80 and CT50 running versions 1.4.64 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-4988.body: IcoFX is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2013-5973.title: VMware ESX and ESXi Virtual Machine File Descriptors Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2013-5973.body: VMware ESX and ESXi are prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers could potentially exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges in the context of the affected application. Following versions are vulnerable: VMware ESX 4.0 and 4.1 VMware ESXi 4.0, 4.1, 5.0, 5.1, and 5.5

CVE-2013-5976.title: F5 BIG-IP APM Access Policy Logout Page Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-5976.body: F5 BIG-IP APM is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize certain unspecified input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. F5 BIG-IP APM 10.1.0 through 10.2.4 and 11.1.0 through 11.3.0 are vulnerable. other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-5977.title: WordPress Cart66 Lite Plugin CVE-2013-5977 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2013-5977.body: Cart66 Lite plugin for WordPress is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions in the context of the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Cart66 Lite 1.5.1.14 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-5978.title: WordPress Cart66 Lite Plugin CVE-2013-5978 Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-5978.body: Cart66 Lite plugin for WordPress is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Cart66 Lite 1.5.1.14 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-6013.body: Juniper Networks Junos is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability. Attackers may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected device. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2013-6017.body: Atmail Webmail Server is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability. CVE-2013-6021.body: Watchguard Extensible Threat Management is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the software fails to perform adequate boundary-checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. CVE-2013-6671.body: Mozilla Firefox, SeaMonkey, and Thunderbird are prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability due to a segmentation fault. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. This issue is fixed in: Firefox 26 Firefox ESR 24.2 Thunderbird 24.2 Seamonkey 2.23

CVE-2013-6672.title: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey CVE-2013-6672 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-6672.body: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey are prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to disclose sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. This issue is fixed in: Firefox 26 SeaMonkey 2.23

CVE-2013-6673.title: Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/SeaMonkey CVE-2013-6673 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2013-6673.body: Mozilla Firefox, Thunderbird and SeaMonkey are prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass security restrictions and use a revoked certificate. This may allow the attacker to perform other attacks. This issue is fixed in: Firefox 26 Firefox ESR 24.2 Thunderbird 24.2 Seamonkey 2.23

CVE-2013-6681.title: Tube Map Live Underground for Android Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-6681.body: Tube Map Live Underground for Android is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Remote attackers can perform man-in-the-middle attacks to gain access to sensitive information. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2013-6691.title: Cisco Adaptive Security Appliance ASA CVE-2013-6691 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-6691.body: Cisco Adaptive Security Appliance ASA is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds check user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause an affected system to reload, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCuj83344.

CVE-2013-6706.title: Cisco IOS XE Software MPLS Packet Handling Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-6706.body: Cisco IOS XE is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to cause a reload of the affected device, denying service to legitimate users. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCuj23992.

CVE-2013-6707.title: Cisco Adaptive Security Appliance Management Connections Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-6707.body: Cisco Adaptive Security Appliance (ASA) is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause an affected device to become unresponsive, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCug33233.

CVE-2013-6708.title: Cisco Cloud Portal CVE-2013-6708 Arbitrary File Download Vulnerability
CVE-2013-6708.body: Cisco Cloud Portal is prone to an arbitrary file-download vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to download arbitrary files. Information obtained may aid in further attacks. This issue being tracked by Cisco Bug IDs CSCuj08426 and CSCui60889.

CVE-2013-6718.title: IBM BladeCenter Advanced Management Module Unspecified Security Vulnerability
CVE-2013-6718.body: IBM BladeCenter Advanced Management Module is prone to an unspecified security vulnerability. Little is known about this issue or its effects at this time. We will update this BID as more information emerges.

CVE-2013-6723.title: IBM WebSphere Portal CVE-2013-6723 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2013-6723.body: IBM WebSphere Portal is prone to a remote information-disclosure vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to obtain potentially sensitive information that may aid in other attacks. WebSphere Portal 8.0 and 8.0.0.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-6725.body: IBM WebSphere Application Server is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2013-6729.title: IBM QuickFile CVE-2013-6729 Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2013-6729.body: IBM QuickFile is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary HTML and script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. IBM QuickFile 1.0.0.0 and 1.1.0.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-6735.body: IBM Web Content Manager is prone to an XPath-injection vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue by manipulating the XPath query logic to carry out unauthorized actions on the application. IBM Web Content Manager 7.0 and 8.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-6981.body: Cisco IOS XE is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attackers to cause the CPP process to crash, denying service to legitimate users. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCul00709.

CVE-2013-6982.body: Cisco NX-OS is prone to denial-of-service vulnerability because it fails to properly handle the BGP updates. CVE-2013-6983.body: Cisco Unified Presence Server is prone to an unspecified SQL-injection vulnerability. A successful exploit may allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCuh35615. Cisco Unified Presence Server 8.6(4) is vulnerable.

CVE-2013-6987.title: Synology DiskStation Manager 'FileBrowser' Component Multiple Directory Traversal Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-6987.body: Synology DiskStation Manager is prone to a multiple directory-traversal vulnerabilities. Remote attackers can use a specially crafted request with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions on system and configuration files in the context of the application. Synology DiskStation Manager 4.3-3810 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-6997.body: Open-Xchange AppSuite is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability and an HTML-injection vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. Open-Xchange AppSuite 7.4.0 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-7025.title: Multiple Dell SonicWALL Products Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-7025.body: Multiple Dell SonicWALL Products are prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. CVE-2013-7027.body: Linux Kernel is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability due to a buffer overflow condition. Attackers may leverage this issue to crash the system, denying service to legitimate users. Linux kernel versions 2.6.32.61, 2.6.34.14, 3.2.53, 3.4.70, 3.10.20, 3.11.9, and 3.12.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-7034.title: LiveZilla 'setCookieValue()' Function PHP Object Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2013-7034.body: LiveZilla is prone to a remote PHP object-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit this issue to inject arbitrary object in to the application. This may allow an attacker to delete files and perform cross-site scripting attacks. LiveZilla 5.1.2.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-7038.title: Libmicrohttpd Multiple Remote Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-7038.body: Libmicrohttpd is prone to multiple remote security vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to Libmicrohttpd 0.9.32 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-7039.title: Libmicrohttpd Multiple Remote Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2013-7039.body: Libmicrohttpd is prone to multiple remote security vulnerabilities. Versions prior to Libmicrohttpd 0.9.32 are vulnerable.

CVE-2013-7040.body: Python is prone to an information-disclosure weakness. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks. Python 2.7 and 3.3 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2013-7041.body: 'pam_userdb' module is prone to a security weakness due to insecure password-hashes comparison Attackers can exploit this issue to perform brute-force attacks and obtain user passwords which may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2013-7049.title: ZNC IRC Bouncer Fish Plugin Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2013-7049.body: The Fish Plugin for ZNC IRC Bouncer is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the process, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2013-7050.body: Debian devscripts package is prone to a remote command-execution vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary commands within the context of the application.

CVE-2013-7051.body: D-Link DIR-100 is prone to the following security vulnerabilities: 1. An authentication-bypass vulnerability 2. Multiple information-disclosure vulnerabilities 3. A cross-site request-forgery vulnerability 4. A cross-site scripting vulnerability An attacker can exploit these issues to execute HTML and arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected device, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, bypass-authentication mechanism, gain access to potentially sensitive information. Other attacks are also possible.

NOTE: this issue was SPLIT from CVE-2013-4152 due to different affected versions.

CVE-2013-7388.title: Trimble Sketchup CVE-2013-3664 Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2013-7388.body: Trimble SketchUp is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied input before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. Successful exploits allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. The following versions are vulnerable. Trimble SketchUp 8 - Maintenance 5 Trimble SketchUp 8 - Maintenance 4 Trimble SketchUp 8 - Maintenance 3 Trimble SketchUp 8 - Maintenance 2 Trimble SketchUp 8 - Maintenance 1 Trimble SketchUp 8 Trimble SketchUp 7.1 - Maintenance 2 Trimble SketchUp 7.1 - Maintenance 1 Trimble SketchUp 7.1 Trimble SketchUp 7 - Maintenance 1 Trimble SketchUp Pro 6 - Maintenance 6 Note 1: The issue described by CVE-2013-7388 has been moved to BID 68451 (paintlib CVE-2013-7388 Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability) for better documentation. Note 2: This issue was previously titled 'Trimble Sketchup CVE-2013-3664 Multiple Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities'. The title and technical details have been changed to better reflect the underlying component affected.
